menyatakan kasus dugaan korupsi anggaran pilkada depok tahun penetapan status tersangka baru kepala kejaksaan negeri kajari kota depok sufari menegaskan penetapan tersangka baru terkait kasus korupsi anggaran pilkada kota depok penetapan tersangka baru kejaksaan negeri kota depok kata sufari radar depok ditemui diruangannya rabu bantahan mengenai kabar diberikan kasi pidsus kejari depok daniel de rozari namanya dicatut pemberitaan media kriminalitascom daniel menyatakan dirinya pernah diwawancarai namanya dicatut media online kriminalitascom berita berjudul diduga korupsi anggara pilkada ketua malam wanita kebanyakan makan mie goreng sebenarnya cuma makan mie goreng masalah orang rumahnya banyak makan mie malam tak yg meninggal mie mengandung arsenic pentoxide aso berhubung habis makan mie wanita makan coklat terjadilah reaksi kimia perut yg membuat arsenic pentoxide aso berubah menjadi arsenic trioxide aso yg sangat beracun inilah yg mengakibatkan hati jantung ginjal pembuluh darah menjadi pengukur kecepatan batas wajar alat disebut speed governors mekanisme keselamatankedua ialah adanya counter weight alat tersebut memberikan keseimbangan lift naik turun stabil mekanisme terakhir ialah peredam kejut shock absorber alat terletak bagian bawah lift fungsinya ialah penahan kejutan keras lift terjatuh hingga bawah ketiga mekanisme mengamankan operasional lift adapun klaim mesin produksi perusahaan memang memiliki variasi perbedaan pencetakan kemasan indomie kata stefanus menyebabkan urutan bumbu indomie menjadi berbedabeda jadi produk kalau berbeda memang biasa kan varian produksi jadi mungkin capnya enggak sama biasalah termasuk soal perbedaan letak bumbu kata terkait rasa berbeda stefanus menduga persepsi konsumen pasalnya konsumen tersebut kata membeli membentuk gerakan bersama aliansi federasi serikat buruhserikat pekerja provinsi dki jakarta gerakan buruh jakarta gbjkemaren serentak mendeklarasikan dukungan pasangan cagubcawagub dki ahokdjarot wakil ketua gbj terus mengkampanyekan cagubcawagub dki ahokdjarot yakin pasangan nomor urut selalu memperhatikan nasib buruh jakarta pungkasmya ditanya soal permasalahan sedang menimpa ahok mengurangi buruh jakarta gbjkemaren serentak mendeklarasikan dukungan pasangan cagubcawagub dki ahokdjarot informasi disampaikan paragraf memiliki data jelas penulisan tata bahasanya berantakan paragraf wakil ketua gbj terus mengkampanyekan cagubcawagub dki ahokdjarot yakin pasangan nomor urut selalu memperhatikan nasib buruh jakarta pungkasmya paragraf tersebut menampilkan informasi jelas disebutkan siapa pasangan no urut tersebut serentak buruh bersuara hidup mati bersama ahok pernyataan dikutip paragraf tersebut jelas diujarkan siapa informasi ditulis tersebut dikatakan valid adapun tata bahasanya pengisian nitrogen murni ban mobil memberikan keuntungan pengendara biasa sumber media sosial narasi hati mngisi tekanan ban nulis bukan utk mematikan business pngisian ban pompa bensin gambar yg upload bukan sama sekali mngajak poro sedulur lebih berhati stasiun pngisian nitrogen skrg mnjamur pompa bensin lewat dn bbrp bulan kemudian baru tringat ttg pengisian sering dimanfaatkan oknum pngusaha pompa nitrogen utk berbuat nakal perhatikan gambar dibawah nyimpen bottle nitrogennya kok malah kompressor angin aneh khaan bbrp kali sy coba mngisi pagi memastikan pertama perkir terkesan dg automaic digital pressure controller yg dipakai pressure yg diminta tepat kalau habis dikalibrasi lho mngisi ban terakhir jjeerrrrr kompressor nyala sengaja turun krn dibelakang mobil motor ngantri tanya berapa roda ribu pak lho kok kompressor nya nyala berarti angin dong mas mana bottle nitrogennya bingung si operator njawab ndaak pak pakai kompressor kalau pakai kuat tekanannya nitrogennya hehehe maas mas nitrogen bottle nya tekanannya psig perlu kompressor untk ngisi ban psig bayar bilang juragan mu dagang jangan pakai bohong kwalat lho serahkan rp rb tenang naik mobil mninggalkan si mas operatos yg mungkin bengong meter jalan mobil dibelakang nyalib dn tekan klakson buka jendela ternyata tadi mobil yg ngantri ngacungi jempol waah hari bikin satu pelanggan nitrogen batal ngisi mungkin si motor hehe bayangkan kalau dg alat yg waah ngraup ribu per mobil jual angin cap nitrogen waaah business abal lumayan poro sedulur kalau dijalan ban kurang angin mampir tukang tambal ban tambah angin dg rp sdh dapet terima kasih mau bener isi nitrogen masuk toko ban minta tambah notrogen rb oke dapet nitrogen langsung dr botlle nya semoga berhati teliti membeli penjelasan ban pesawat peserta pesta bugil pantai dimakan piranha sumber media sosial httpsmfacebookcomphotophpfbididseta narasi naudzubillah minzalik berencana mengadakan konsert party bugil disuatu pantai bulan ramadhan malah terjadilah bencana allah kirimkan satu ekor ikan semua hampir habis dilahap ikan tersebut semoga menjadi satu ajaran buat diri qt sendiri aminn allah menghinakan perbuatan hina yg lakukanya allah mengangkat derajat seseorang perbuatan baik ketaatanya perbuatan hina mati hina sia sia insya allah memanfaatkan umur yg berikan allah kpda selalu taat kebaikan jalan yg ridhoinya aamiin penjelasan postingan klaim tersebut ditampilkan beberapa cuplikan kerumunan orang tepi pantai tengah diserang seekor ikan piranha ganas pembuat postingan mengklaim kalau gambar tersebut merupakan dokumentasi kegiatan pesta bugil sebuah pantai bulan ramadan sayangnya pembuat postingan menyebutkan nama lokasi pantai tersebut berdasarkan penelusuran melalui pencarian gambar ternyata gambar tersebut bukanlah berasal peristiwa nyata gambar tersebut merupakan cuplikan film berjudul piranha d beredar sejak tahun film tersebut memang mengisahkan mengenai keganasan ikan piranha menyerang manusia klaim pembuat posting kalau ikan piranha menyerang orang pesta bugil satu merupakan kesalahan fatal ikan piranha bukanlah ikan menyerang mangsa individu ikan tersebut selalu menyerang mangsa bergerombol ikan memiliki naluri bergerak gerombolan jadi klaim pembuat posting dipastikan terpatahkan berikut penjelasan situs smithsoniancom mengenai pergerakan ikan piranha naluri selalu bergerombol piranhas run in packs for safety not strength part of piranhas fierce reputation stems from the fact that they often swim in packs or shoals redbellied piranhas are particularly known as pack hunters though it might seem an advantageous hunting techniquemore fish could theoretically take down a larger foethe behavior actually stems from fear piranhas arent apex predatorstheyre prey to caimans birds river dolphins and other large pescatarian fish so traveling in shoals has the effect of protecting the inner fish from attack further shoals tend to have a hierarchy of larger older fish towards the center and younger fish on the outer edges suggesting that safety might be the true motivation in researchers looked at shoal formation in captive redbellied piranhas and found that the fish both breathed easier in larger shoals and responded more calmly to simulated predator attacks the researchers also observed wild piranhas forming larger shoals in shallow waters where they might be more vulnerable adapun ikan piranha sembarangan menyerang manusia hewan lainnya masuk daerahnya ikan aslinya berasal sungai amazon menyerang mangsa kiranya dianggap makanan biasanya hewan diserang piranha merupakan hewan lemah fisiknya jadi benar bila klaim piranha langsung menyerang manusia membabi buta berikut penjelasan singkat mengenai tabiat piranha salah seorang pemelihara ikan tersebut situs dwcom piranhas are very conservative they dont like change including when it comes to food in the wild they are the amazons health police they eat sick or injured fish and as such prevent illnesses from spreading they are not gourmet diners penjelasan simpulkan kabar disebarkan melalui media sosial merupakan berita hoax referensi httpswwwsmithsonianmagcomsciencenaturefunfactsaboutpiranhas httpsmoviewebcombloodynewpiranhadimagesturnthewaterred httpmdwcomenpetsavagesbetyouneverknewpiranhaswereshyeasilystartledandconservativea catatan postingan hoax tersebut kiranya dihapus pemilik akun alamat postingan mati

membuat game pertama massively multiplayer online mmo berjudul meridian kemudian hanke menjual game tersebut do mulai menekuni pemetaan dunia tahun hanke mendirikan keyhole menciptakan gps terhubung peta dunia foto udara d dunia pertama kalinya tahun google membeli keyhole bantuan hanke mengubah keyhole menjadi sekarang disebut google earth mulai sinilah hanke memutuskan fokus game berbasis gps tahun hanke memimpin tim google geo menciptakan google maps google street view masa hanke mulai mengumpulkan orangorang nantinya menjadi sebuah tim menciptakan pokemon go tahun hanke mendirikan niantic labs sebuah startup didanai google membuat game berbasis peta alasan hanke memilih nama niantic nama tersebut merupakan nama sebuah kapal pemburu ikan paus datang san francisco masa penemuan emas james w marshall dikenal istilah california gold rush kapalkapal lainpun mulai berdatangan masa jadilah sekarang tahun niantic merilis game perdana berbasis mmo berjudul ingress dikatakan john mendapatkan inspirasi membuat ingress perjalanan pergipulang kantor tahun google pokemon company bekerjasama membuat sebuah kelakar april mop memungkinkan pengguna menemukan pokemon google maps mana tempat paling populer menjadi pokestop gyms pokemon go bulan desember hingga februari hanke mengumpulkan dana sebesar juta google nintendo pokemon company sejumlah investor lainnya membentuk tim permainan imajinatif berbasis peta menggunakan lokasi gps global positioning system real peta google maps dikombinasikan karakter kartun sangat populer pokemon dibumbui teknologi augmented reality realitas disempurnakan bermain pokemon go tak asing beberapa titik tertentu game pokemon go disebut pokestop menariknya pokestop berfungsi tempat mendapatkan item gratis tersebut justru banyak mendeteksi tempat ibadah masjid gereja hingga wihara lantas tersebut terjadi informasi sebenarnya pokemon go permainan berbasis gps pernah diluncurkan niantic labs sebuah perusahaan rintisan bawah akhirnya pokemon go memberlakukan titiktitik tersebut pokestop menjelaskan banyak pokestop poke gym masjid tower masjid database yg dipakai pokemon go ingress dulu memainkan ingress membuat port ratarata memanfaatkan tower masjid rumah ibadah makanya pokemon go banyak pokestoo gym masjid tempat ibadah jadi game sama sekali hubungan kegiatan intelegent apapun terlalu berlebihan menganggap agen httpwwwimgrumnetmedia_ narasi renungan pagi ahok indonesia sedang mementaskan kebenaran melihat kebencian yg sedang unjuk rasa justru sy sangat mengucap syukur sy semakin yakin kepercayaan sy sy semakin mengasihi mencintai tuhan keyakinan bukan dunia bukan ciptaan manusia benar keyakinan yg allah pencipta manusia langit bumi kitab suci dihina pernah sakit hati firman yg dalamnya berkata kasihanilah tahu apa yg perbuat rumah ibadah dihancurkankami membalas menuntut tahu persis rumah ibadah tempat roh allah yg sesungguhnya hati kitab tuhan dinista dihujat pernah sakit hati pernah unjuk rasa demo yakin allah yg sembah allah yg maha kuasa yg sanggup membela umatnya dgn caranya sendiri apapun kejahatan lakukan kamikami selalu taat belajar mengasihinya tuhan tuhan yg hidup yg mengajar kasihilah yg memusuhimu demo unjuk rasa yg terjadi bukti sedang mengungkapkan kebencian sedang meragukan allah yg sembah menuntut cara manusia berserah pd allah yg maha kuasa sedang percaya dgn kuasa allah bertindak dgn caranya sendiri sedang percaya dgn pemerintah yg merupakan wakil allah didunia sedang berambisi memutuskan penghakiman orang yg bersalah hai dunia lihatlah buah perbuatan apa yg hasilkan ucap syukur yg luar biasa allah yg sembah firmannya menuntun hidup terang penghakiman kebencian pembunuhan _sekalipun hny dlm bentuk ucapan_ sangat dilarang lakukan perintahnyaagar memberkati mengasihi segala keadaan puji syukur rumah ibadah buat tempat menebar kasih bukan mengobarkan dendam kebencian trimakasih tuhan apa yg terjadi dinegeriku inikarena semakin kagum mengasihimu semakin beriman keyakinanku kebenaran yg sejati praise the lord basuki tjahaja purnama penjelasan tulisan tersebut bukanlah tulisan buatan basuki tjahaja purnama tulisan pertama kali diunggah akun facebook kasih batas tanggal november tulisan mengatasnamakan ahok sapaan karib basuki tertanggal november november berikut kutipan tulisan aslinya kesaksian seorang anak tuhan pilih tuhan kepercayaan nya lama beralih percaya yesus kristus praise lord terpujilah tuhan salam sukacita ktb ministry sharing by esther rey shirley indonesia sedang mementaskan kebenaran melihat kebencian yg sedang unjuk rasa justru sy sangat mengucap syukur sy semakin yakin kepercayaan sy sy semakin mengasihi mencintai tuhan sy keyakinan bukan dunia bukan ciptaan manusia benar keyakinan yg allah pencipta manusia langit bumi kitab suci dihina pernah sakit hati firman yg dalamnya berkata kasihanilah tahu apa yg perbuat rumah ibadah dihancurkankami membalas menuntut tahu persis rumah ibadah tempat roh allah yg sesungguhnya adala hati kitab tuhan dinista dihujat pernah sakit hati pernah unjuk rasa demo yakin allah yg sembah allah yg maha kuasa yg sanggup membela umatnya dgn caranya sendiri apapun kejahatan lakukan kamikami selalu taat belajar mengasihinya tuhan tuhan yg hidup yg mengajar kasihilah yg memusuhimu demo unjuk rasa yg terjadi bukti sedang mengungkapkan kebencian sedang meragukan allah yg sembah menuntut cara manusia berserah pd allah yg maha kuasa sedang percaya dgn kuasa allah bertindak dgn caranya sendiri sedang percaya dgn pemerintah yg merupakan wakil allah didunia sedang berambisi memutuskan penghakiman orang yg bersalah hai dunia lihatlah buah perbuatan apa yg hasilkan ucap syukur yg luar biasa allah yg sembah firmannya menuntun hidup terang penghakiman kebencian pembunuhan _sekalipun hny dlm bentuk ucapan_ sangat dilarang lakukan perintahnyaagar memberkati mengasihi segala keadaan puji syukur rumah ibadah buat tempat menghancurkan _bukan tempat mengobarkan_ dendam kebenciantetapi tempat menebar kasih trimakasih tuhan apa yg terjadi dinegeriku inikarena semakin kagum mengasihimu semakin beriman keyakinanku kebenaran yg sejati praise the lord berdasarkan tulisan sarlito wirawan sarwono lgbt sumber media sosial narasi lgbt sebuah gerakan penularan sarlito wirawan sarwono guru besar fakultas psikologi ui mungkin heran bertanya keras perilaku lesbianism gay bisexual and transsexualism lgbt seakan penuh murka tak memberikan sedikitpun ruang toleransi pengidapnya mungkin perlu klarifikasi sedang bicara pelaku orang oknum oknum orang pelaku lgbt tetap mengutamakan kasihsayang berempati merangkul meluruskan sedang bicara sebuah perilaku personal partikular tak sedang bicara sebuah gaya hidup menyimpang menjangkiti sekelompok orang sedang bicara sebuah gerakan sedang bicara sebuah gerakan organized crime sistematis massif sedang menularkan sebuah penyakit sekali bukan semata perilaku partikular sebuah kerumun bahkan bukan sematamata sebuah gaya hidup sebuah harakah movement penjelasan tulisan tersebut bukanlah tulisan prof dr sarlito wirawan sarwono guru besar psikologi ui bantahan mengenai tulisan dilihat tulisan ade armando dosen komunikasi fisip universitas indonesia berikut kebohongan ketiga terkait seorang ahli psikologi terkemuka indonesia profesor sarlito sarwono sejak akhir februari media sosial beredar tulisan berjudul lgbt sebuah gerakan penularan publik tertera penulis prof sarlito wirawan sarwono guru besar fakultas psikologi universitas indonesia intinya tulisan mengingatkan masyarakat pembaca bahaya gerakan lgbt si penulis bahkan menggambarkan gerakan lgbt kejahatan terorganisir organized crime sistematis massif sedang menularkan penyakit kata si penulis dihadapi indonesia bukan sekadar perilaku partikular kerumunan gaya hidup sebuah movement si penulis menggambarkan mengumpulkan banyak kesaksian kampuskampus mahasiswamahasiswa normal dibuat menjadi lgbt keluar gerakan menggambarkan bagaimana gerakan tersebut mempenetrasi kehidupan kampus mengembangkan perilaku persis sebuah sekte kultus gerakan eksklusif anggotanya kata si penulis bersikap fanatik penetratif indoktrinatif sadar pertumbuhan jumlah dilakukan melalui penularan tak mungkin lewat keturunan kata si penulis kaum lgbt bergerilya efektif dukungan payung ham institusi internasional prof sarlito memang dikenal guru besar universitas indonesia memiliki perhatian besar soal psikologi sosial bila benar sarlito memberi peringatan semacam lazimnya datang pemantauan mendalam sarlito memiliki kedekatan berbagai jaringan kemasyarakatan termasuk jaringan mahasiwa bila mengatakan mengumpulkan banyak kesaksian kampus apa dikatakannya kemungkinan besar diandalkan nyatanya bukan tulisan sarlito sendiri berusaha menyebarkan klarifikasi berbagai media sosial manipulasi tersebut tulisan kepalang tersebar ditelusuri ternyata artikel ditulis adriano rusfi lulusan psikologi ui kini menjadi konsultan manajemen pendidikan kelompok anti lgbt nama adriano rupanya dianggap kurang berpengaruh namanya dihilangkan kemudian diganti prof sarlito url httpwwwmadinaonlineidceditorialkebohongandemikebohonganolehkaumantilgbtkasusdrfidiansjahprofsarlitodandanaasing tulisan diaku tulisan prof sarlito nyatanya merupakan tulisan adriano rusfi psikolog ular raksasa pedalaman kalimantan sumber media online narasi an aerial photograph that appears to show a gigantic snake swimming along the remote waterway has emerged sparking great concern among local communities but it is not clear whether the photograph is genuine or a clever piece of photoediting some suggested the snake was in fact a log or a speed boat and others complained the colour of the river in the photo was too dark the most common theory is that the photo has been manipulated on a computer the image has even stumped the new straits times newspaper in kuala lumpur which suggested readers decide for themselves however on the banks of the river villagers are convinced of the massive serpents existence and have even given it a name nabau after an ancient sea serpent which can transform itself into the shapes of different animals earlier this month scientists unearthed the fossil of a snake that was longer than a bus as heavy as a small car and which could swallow an animal the size of a cow the ft long monster named titanoboa was so big that it lived on a diet of crocodiles and giant turtles squeezing them to death and devouring them whole penjelasan ular raksasa pedalaman kalimantan masyarakat dunia khususnya indonesia pernah dihebohkan sebuah foto penampakan ular raksasa berenang sungai pedalaman hutan kalimantan lebih dikenal sebutan borneo snake borneo river berawal foto dimuat surat kabar telegraph london februari lalu keterangannya foto ambil menggunakan helikopter atas sungai baleh berita lihat tanker flipped over and exploded in the democratic republic of congo a government spokesman said saturday while the spokesman mende omalanga said five of the dead were united nations peacekeepers an official with the un mission in the capital of kinshasa contradicted the report no un members were killed in the explosion said madnodje mounoubai the tanker flipped over friday afternoon said omalanga the countrys minister of communications it was attempting to overtake a bus in sange in south kivu province on the countrys eastern border when oil began to spill from the overturned tanker local residents attempted to collect the oil one was smoking a cigarette causing the tanker to explode omalanga said the largest group of victims had been sitting in a bar near the accident site watching the world cup match between the netherlands and brazil he said some of the injured were being treated locally in surrounding villages but most were sent to the nearby town of uvira omalanga division caught on a video that is circulating online the video which has attracted criticism on social media showed knu troops in uniform beating and kicking a group of young men tied up on the ground in a statement released on tuesday the knu claimed the youths were drugaddicted hooligans who had been sent to the armed group by their communities to be guided back on to the right path but admitted that it was wrong to subject them to physical punishment which it said was against the groups guidelines the statement did not explain why the youths were beaten up by the knu soldiers but vowed to investigate the matter and take necessary action against the wrongdoers and to prevent this from happening again in the minute secondlong video a group of around knu soldiers is seen kicking and shouting at the tiedup youths one of the soldiers was also seen beating them with a bamboo stick according to unconfirmed rumours on social media the youths were detained by the knu for brawling dijadikan target ujicoba peluru tersebut faktanya peluru postingan tersebut bukanlah peluru gas airmata peluru karet peluru intinya digunakan menertibkan kericuhan terjadi baik aksi demonstrasi maupun aksi lainnya peluru tersebut berjenis cs mm multiple projectile ammunition masuk klasifikasi multiple projectile ammunitionbullet pengertian multiple projectile ammunitionbullets peluru memiliki banyak projektil dalamnya jadi ditembakkan peluru mengeluarkan beberapa projektil sasaran projektil berupa projektil tajam ataupun projektil karet berbahaya berikut kutipan mengenai definisi multiple projectile ammunitionbullet a casing has a projectile receiving end portion and a primer receiving end portion a plurality of projectiles is positioned in a stacked configuration within the casing at the projectile receiving end portion a propellant receiving space is defined within the casing between an innermost one of the projectiles and the primer receiving end portion of the casing the innermost one of the projectiles has a gas check body attached thereto at an end face thereof exposed to the propellant receiving space of the casing a first cannulure is positioned between the gas check body and the primer receiving end portion of the casing for defining a protrusion for limiting displacement of the gas check body toward the primer receiving end portion of the casing a second cannulure is positioned within the projectile receiving end portion of the casing for forming a protrusion that engages an outermost one of the projectiles peluru tersebut data google patent dipatenkan maret amerika serikat jadi bila dikatakan peluru tersebut baru peserta aksi november target uji coba benar adapun peluru lumrah digunakan beberapa negara perancis makau portugis informasi tuduhan azam guntur sumber media sosial facebook narasi narasi berasal akun azzam mujahid izzulhaq sabtu november berikut narasinya provokator kericuhan sebelumnya ditangkap aparat kepolisian melakukan provokasi melempari botol minuman arah demonstran arah petugas keamanan mengaku wartawan salah satu media kompas tetiba sosok wajah tubuhnya hadir kompas tv berubah status menjadi korban kericuhan hebat kan sebarkan buat provokator menjadi korban yg sebenarnya korban atas perilakunya yg memalukan diri keluarganya courtesy of pictures mochamad faizin habsy afwan riyadi widiyanto ami cukupsatukali selamatkanindonesia lintasanpikiran penjelasan status azzam mujahid izzulhaq tersebut merupakan komentarnya atas terjadinya kericuhan akhir aksi tanggal november tuduhannya ditujukan salah satu kamerawan kompas tv muhammad guntur tuduhannya dibagikan warganet sebanyak kali tuduhan azzam tersebut memiliki bukti kuat postingan azzam tersebut mendapat perhatian ketua pertimbangan majelis ulama indonesia mui muhammad sirajuddin syamsuddin karib dikenal nama din syamsuddin pria asal sumbawa besar ntb menuliskan klarifikasi atas tuduhan azzam berikut kutipan klarifikasi din syamsuddin ikhwany alaizza wartawan dlm gambar atas mas muhammad guntur kamerawan kompas tv yg kenal meliput lapangan aksi damai november bukan provokator utk diketahui kompas tv satu tv berita nasional yg menyiarkan langsung aksi damai objektif proporsional kebetulan sesi pra shalat jumat bersama prof azra azyumardi azrared menjadi narasumber studio sesi pasca shalat jumat dr abdul mukti sekum pp muhammadiyah dr gun gun heryanto dosen fakultas dakwah uin jakarta yg jadi narasumber mohon maklum tdk disebarluaskan kompas tv sbg anti aksi damai silakan lihat rekaman siarannya sepanjang hari jumat bahkan menyampaikan terima kasih atas peliputan kompas tv yg simpatik syukran salam din syamsuddin klarifikasi din syamsuddin klarifikasi langsung muhammad guntur berikut kutipan klarifikasinya guntur menjelaskan kejadian dirinya tengah membawa kamera beserta peralatan siaran langsung bobotnya mencapai kilogram lebih bobot seberat menyatakan mungkin dirinya sempat melempar botol air mineral kalau gerak aja gambarnya goyang mesti ngelempar ngerekam sendiri enggak kebayang gimana caranya lempar botol air mineral ngerekam sendiri kata guntur ditemui mapolres metro jakarta pusat minggu guntur menceritakan awal mula kejadian menimpa dirinya kejadian berawal pukul wib rekan reporternya mendapat tugas laporan siaran langsung guntur tugas mengharuskannya maju depan tengahtengah barikade polisi demonstran lokasi berdiri tak jauh gedung mahkamah agung tepatnya jalan veteran mulai merekam video guntur menyebut tibatiba lemparan air mineral arah polisi disertai aksi dorongdorong sebagian massa massa sebelah kiri jalan veteran dorongdorongan polisi sebagian minta jangan dorongdorong tutur guntur aksi dorongdorong guntur menyebut salah seorang pengunjuk rasa berteriak meminta tak merekam video guntur teriakan tersebut memancing pengunjuk rasa mendatanginya beberapa detik guntur dikerumuni pengunjuk rasa diinterogasi ditanya asal media tempatnya bekerja guntur massa langsung menunjukan respons tak bersahabat dirinya menyebutkan berasal kompas tv teriakanteriakan tuduhan provokator penyusup langsung diarahkan kepadanya orang berusaha ngamanin bawa arah kepolisian tengah jalan mukul kepala bagian belakang dipukul ucap guntur pinggir jalan guntur menyebut salah seorang demonstran langsung meminta mencabut memori kameranya hidupin mau hapus gambarnya bilang enggak memorinya dikeluarin keluarin memori bilang enggak tahu memorinya tahu kamera terus kasih satu kata guntur guntur kedua memori kameranya dicabut kemudian diberikan salah indonesia didalamnya cairan penyebab kanker payudara hati ibuibu coba semua bh diperiksa caranya dg mencobloscoblos dg jarum kalau keluar cairan berarti bh yg dimaksud penjelasan isu sama pernah terjadi burkino faso tepatnya paruh kedua tahun dikutip media anti hoax asal kamerun stopblablacom tanggal agustus stopblablacom cairan berada bra tersebut gliserin gliserin cairan berwarna kental berbau dibuat lemak olahan minyak colza minyak sawit asam lemak gliserol senyawa digunakan pelembab kulit silikon terdiri atom silikon bergabung atom karbon berwarna berbau larut air viskositas meningkat berat molekulnya kebanyakan digunakan sektor kesehatan membuat lotion implan payudara krim beracun kulit terjadi alergi tertentu sama gliserin first thing to know is that there is a wide range of bras and pads foam silicon microbeads or gel pockets the type concerned in the videos is the one with pockets gel this kind of pads is often found in pushup bras it helps as it name suggests push breasts up and make them feel and look more natural in most cases the pockets which are in polypropylene plastic are filled with glycerin or silicone gel siloxane glycerin is colorless viscous and odorless liquid it is made with modified fat colza oil palm oil or glycerols fatty acids the compound is used as a skin moisturizing agent silicones are composed of silicon atoms joined with carbon atoms they are colorless odorless and nonsoluble in water their viscosity increases with their molecular weight they are mostly used in the health sector to make lotions breast implants creams they are not toxic to the skin unless in the case of a particular allergy same for glycerin catatan penelitian aktual menunjukkan bra berisi cairan bersifat toksik bersifat karsinogenik isu berkaitan because of their distinctive service headgear are a special operations unit of the turkish armed forces made up of volunteers rigorously selected from all branches of the armed forces after graduating httpsgoogldfxt mobile cell phonesedit for gsmgsm umts phones the gsm standard defines the following forwarding unstructured supplementary service data these were developed by etsi and are based on standard european diversion codes and are similar to those used on most landlines in the eu forward service activate cancel deregister cancel retain status reestablish unconditional forwarding all calls phone number conditional forwarding if busy phone number if not answered phone number incl time delay if out of reach phone number all forwards phone number all conditional forwards phone number if the prefix to the forwarding command is instead of the usual then the phone number in that command is registered in the network if after that the forwarding is deactivated using a command with a single then later it will be possible to reactivate this forwarding again with a simple command without a phone number in it the forwarding will be reactivated to the number registered in the network for example if one uses the outofreach code in a forwarding command and after that one deactivates the forwarding then later it will be possible to reactivate the outofreach forwarding without specifying a number after the above command all calls made to the phone while it is out of reach will be forwarded to it is possible to activate the feature to a number other than the registered number while still retaining the registered number for later use for example issuing the command will result in calls being forwarded to and not to the registered number however if later a command is issued then the calls will again be forwarded to the registered number and not to the number from the previous forwarding command additionally in gsm networks such as tmobile and att mobility in usa and all mobile networks in eu it is possible to set the number of seconds the phone will ring before forwarding this is specified by inserting scxx prior to the final of the forwarding command where sc is a service type code for voice for data for fax and xx is the number of seconds in increments of seconds if sc is omitted just xx then by default all service types will be forwarded for example forwarding on noanswer can be set with phone numberseconds in some networks there may be a limit of not more than seconds before forwarding ie xx can only be or all greater values like and will result in the forwarding command being rejected and an error message returned sumber httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

baca blog httpsgooglavcj faq whatsapp hoax messages you may have received spam from an unauthorized third party and not whatsapp we work diligently to reduce any spam messages that come through our system creating a safe space for users to communicate with one another is a priority however just like regular sms or phone calls it is possible for other whatsapp users who have your phone number to contact you thus we want to help you identify and handle these messages unwanted messages from unauthorized third parties come in many forms such as spam hoax and phishing messages all these types of messages are broadly defined as unsolicited messages from unauthorized third parties that try to deceive you and prompt you to act in a certain way you may be the target of a deceptive scheme if any of the following describes a message you receive via whatsapp or email the sender claims to be affiliated with whatsapp the message content includes instructions to forward the message the message claims you can avoid punishment like account suspension if you forward the message the message content includes a reward or gift from whatsapp or another person what to do if i receive these messages we always advise you to block the sender disregard the message and delete it to learn more about blocking read this faq article to avoid exposing your contacts to potential harm please never forward these messages to them for more information about hoax messages in general please read our blog httpsgoogldvepdh hasil pencarian google images httpsgooglnhqgt salah satu situs membahas donation hoaxes whatsapp will not and does not make charitable donations for sharing photos or messages the messenger service has no way of tracking of many times a specific message has been forwarded or who it has been sent to therefore dont fall for the request to share posts with instructions to share a photo or message to help raise money for someone in need while these messages generally do not have any malware attached to them the stories are generally bogus so all you will be doing is helping to spread fake news sebelumnya pernah dibahas fafhh httpsgooglivsjb

httpsgooglorlvzj artikel asli beware false news spreading in social media mathi alias sardines have dangerous disease days ago published by deepa biswas beware false news spreading in social media mathi alias sardines have dangerous disease photo facebook new delhi october the favourite fish of malayalis sardines became afflicted with an unidentified disease inside its belly it was found some small egglike thing but generally sardines do not have such a thing in its belly those who eat sardines please be careful and share maximum this message had gone viral in the social media since twothree days the viral facebook whatsapp message has also shown pictures of the symptoms of the socalled unknow disease the post claimed that those sardines were caught from muscat the picture showed the cut opened belly of the sardines which had the egglike and crystallike objects glugea is capable of making the cells around it in the shape of a sphere to form a shield but the experts in the health sector claimed that it is a false news the egglike thing seen in sardines are nothing but a parasite called glugea which could grow in fishes they grow inside the cells of fishes its scientific name is glugea sardinellensis this parasite is not considered as a rare one this is seen as the white egglike or the crystallike thing this could grow up to mm size this growth is known as xenoma where fishes grow in large clusters the glugea would be spread more according to media reports doctors say that it does not make any health issues if the glugea affected fish is eaten after cleaning proper washing and boiling in fact it is not a strange or dangerous disease so no need to avoid eating sardines after reading the fake news tags disease mathi sardines httpsgooglmjyztw google translate ikan sarden sarden sarden biasanya dimakan salah satu metode pertama disimpulkan metode tradisional mediterania dinamakan asalusulnya walaupun teknologi serupa diterapkan tempat umumnya digambarkan metode raw pack kedua metode memasukkan langkah merokok panas bukan pramemasak metode terakhir biasanya dilakukan negaranegara eropa barat metode mediterania tradisional entah sarden segar beku digunakan menghasilkan produk kalengan berkualitas baik asalkan kondisi penanganan awal melindungi ikan kerusakan berlebihan selama pengangkutan penyimpanan urutan mana operasi awal dilakukan bervariasi prosesor prosesor mungkin mencerminkan halhal kompleksitas garis kecepatan produksi tingkat otomasi ketersediaan tenaga kerja sumber jenis bahan baku satu urutan garis pengalengan bergaya mediterania berikut sarden ditimbang dicuci lalu dikebiri cara dicelupkan larutan jenuh menit tergantung ukuran kandungan lemak diberi nilai diberi nobel dikemas urutan alternatif nobbing mendahului brining urutan operasi praperawatan menjadi berat pencucian nobbing brining batch terus menerus konveyor sekrup kadar garam akhir pengepakan pencucian meskipun modifikasi prosedur barubaru mencakup penambahan garam langsung kaleng diisi berarti langkah brining dihilangkan sarden diberi makan otomatis manual mesin nobel mana kepala jeroan ekor dilepas mesin dipasang memotong ikan panjang standar menjadi potongan silang keseragaman paket tercapai mesin tersedia melengkapi operasi nobbing tradisional kemudian mengemas ikan kaleng otomatis banyak kasus pengepakan tetap merupakan operasi manual pramemasak sarden kaleng diisi dilakukan pemasak uap otomatis tahap pertama kapal uap beroperasi suhu c melalui mana kaleng dilewatkan dipegang terbalik konveyor berlubang memungkinkan masuknya uap drainase kondensat minyak simultan daging beberapa precooker kaleng dikukus posisi tegak dibalik dikeringkan tahap kedua tahap akhir pramemasak proses pengeringan berlangsung c metode pramemasak alternatif beberapa canners menggoreng sarden umumnya lebih mahal kaleng mengandung ikan pramasak masuk stasiun pengisian cairan salah satu air garam air minyak nabati saus perendam ditambahkan manual ui diadakan desember mendatang informasi benar hoaks donor sperma fkui perlu diluruskan kata gita rabu gita seminar diadakannya memang pembahasan inseminasi membantu suami istri mendapatkan keturunan pesertanya pakar ahli dibidangnya bukan masyarakat awam sumber whatsapp narasi donor sperma workshop iui tanggal desember tempat gedung imeri fkui fee ribu makan siang dibutuhkan orang donor buat temen cowonya sekolah kerja or main daerah salemba fkui mohon bantuan sumbangannya cp eli whatsapp and call penyelenggara inarepromed indonesian reproductive medicine research and training center fkui universitas indonesia ui membantah adanya acara donor sperma ui diadakan desember mendatang informasi benar hoaks donor sperma fkui perlu diluruskan kata gita rabu gita seminar diadakannya memang pembahasan inseminasi membantu suami istri mendapatkan keturunan pesertanya pakar ahli dibidangnya bukan masyarakat awam pesertanya dokter umum dokter spesialis ahli laboratorium memiliki kemampuan melakukan pencucian sperma disemprotkan rahim ibu sperma suami tindakan dilakukan sepasang suami istri ujar gita senada gita manager riset pengabdian masyarakat fakultas kedokteran universitas indonesia budi wiweko melihat informasi hoax donor sperma tersebut sisi upah dijanjikan diterima pendonor menurutnya biaya inseminasi jumlah upahnya rp ribu tak sepadan biaya satu kali pencucian sperma masuk proses inseminasi biasanya ratarata rp juta termasuk obat total rp juta semua klinik kesuburan kalau cuma dikasih rp hoaks jelasnya diketahui hoax terkait donor sperma pernah dihubungkan fetus soup eaten by asians sop bayi dimakan orangorang asia an old hoax which already debunked in the man in the photographs is chinese performance artist zhu yu who staged a conceptual shock piece called eating people at a shanghai arts festival in more explanation and reference section hoax lama terbongkar tahun lakilaki foto tersebut artis cina bernama zhu yu membuat pertunjukan menggemparkan judul memakan orang festival seni shanghai tahun selengkapnya bagian penjelasan referensi source question asked by one of ahssf member anti hoax slander sedition forum this forum httpsgooglcpzqnp already shared times when screen shot was made httpsgooglsocqku tap or click to see other accounts who also share public posts narration whats happening to the world sad to say this is legal in china ctto other narration variations explanationan old hoax which already debunked in the man in the photographs is chinese performance artist zhu yu who staged a conceptual shock piece called eating people at a shanghai arts festival in maintaining that no religion forbids cannibalism nor can i find any law which prevents us from eating people zhu yu acted out a performance in which he appeared to eat a stillborn or aborted child likely constructed by placing a dolls head on a ducks carcass and said that he took advantage of the space between morality and the law and based my work on it referencehttpsgooglkbkyq snopescom fetus soup eaten by asiansrumor photograph shows a man eating a dead baby served at an asian restaurantclaim photograph shows a man eating a dead baby served at an asian restaurantfalseexample collected via email how cruel can humans beplease finish your meal before open the fileswhat u are going to witness here is a fact dont get scared its taiwans hottest food in taiwan dead babies or fetuses could be bought at to from hospitals to meet the high demand for grilled and barbecued babies what a sad state of affairsplease forward this msg to as many people as u can so it can be seen by the world and someone takes action on the sameorigins one of the downsides of a burgeoning internet is it fosters the delirious spread of misinformation as revealed fact in the blink of an eye that was the case in when widelycirculated photos which showed a large asian man eating what appeared to be a cooked baby served at a restaurant were taken by many at face value the pictures were later teamed with thebreathless news that roast fetus was now the hottest dining craze in taiwan with outraged emails offering the offensive pictures as proof the recipient could view for himselfthe truth proved far less horrifying than the rumor the photographs shown above were taken seriously by a number of law enforcement agencies who viewed them and both scotland yard and the fbi investigated this matter trying to determine when and where the pictures were taken and the identities of those appearing in themthe origins of the images were quickly uncovered the man in the photographs is chinese performance artist zhu yu who staged a conceptual shock piece called eating people at a shanghai arts festival in maintaining that no religion forbids cannibalism nor can i find any law which prevents us from eating people zhu yu acted out a performance in which he appeared to eat a stillborn or aborted child likely constructed by placing a dolls head on a ducks carcass and said that he took advantage of the space between morality and the law and based my work on itthe controversial photographs have since been part of a number of art exhibits and caused another stir in when they were aired on television in the uk as part of the beijing swings documentarychannel four has screened a controversial television programme which showed photographs of a man eating a baby the photographs had been doing the rounds on the internet for some time but it was the first time they had been aired on terrestrial television in the ukbeijing swings showed colour pictures of chinese artist zhu yu washing a dead stillborn baby in a sink and putting its dismembered parts in his mouthyu said he had no need to defend himself because an artist does not give answers but he conceded he was right to be scolded adding that it was his responsibility to spark debate about art and morality he calls the piece eating peoplebarbara cry wolf mikkelsonlast updated may previously discussed at httpsgooglxzxmqz this debunk is also posted in english since the hoax and those who also share it is from outside indonesia source httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink sop bayi dimakan orangorang meninggal janin dibeli seharga dolar dolar rumah sakit memenuhi permintaan tinggi bayi panggang keadaan menyedihkantolong kirimkan pesan orang sebanyak mungkin dilihat dunia seseorang mengambil bukti dilihat sendiri penerimanyakebenarannya terbukti jauh menakutkan isunya fotofoto diatas direspon serius beberapa badan penegak hukum melihatnya scotland yard fbi menyelidiki persoalan mencoba menentukan kapan fotofoto tersebut dibuat identitas muncul dalamnyaasal fotofoto tersebut segera diketahui lakilaki foto tersebut artis cina bernama zhu yu membuat pertunjukan mengejutkan judul memakan orang festival seni shanghai tahun berpendapat agama melarang kanibalisme menemukan hukum melarang memakan orang zhu yu mempertontonkan memperlihatkan memakan seorang bayi lahir meninggal diaborsi kemungkinan dibuat cara memasang kepala boneka badan seekor bebek mengatakan mengambil keuntungan ruang moral hukum mendasarkan karya itufotofoto kontroversial tersebut menjadi bagian beberapa pameran seni menimbulkan kegemparan ditayangkan televisi inggris bagian dokumenter beijing swings channel empat menyaring sebuah program televisi kontroversial menampilkan fotofoto seorang lakilaki memakan seorang bayi fotofoto tersebut bersirkulasi internet selama beberapa lama pertama kali ditayangkan televisi inggrisbeijing swings menampilkan fotofoto berwarna seniman cina zhyu yu mencuci seorang bayi dilahirkan meninggal wastafel memasukkan bagianbagian tubuh terpotong mulutnyayu tahun mengatakan perlu membela diri seorang seniman perlu memberikan jawaban mengakui betul vote for israel or palestine for google maps is google earth conducting a vote over whether to identify israel or palestine on its maps claim google earth is conducting a vote over whether to identify israel or palestine on its maps false example collected via email august is this true or hoax this is a must do message immediately please share google launches a vote to name israel or palestine on its map in google earth so far voted in favour of israel please send it to each list you have to vote for palestine all you have to do is click on the link below and then select the palestinian flag thanks for your support httpwwwisraelvspalestinecomgben please share with other immediately this just take seconds please vote jazakallah khair origins this appeal to vote for whether google earth should identify israel or palestine on its maps of the middle east hit the internet in mid amidst armed conflict between israeli forces and hamas militants there was nothing to it google doesnt choose how to identify the national entities shown on its maps by popular vote and google earth recognizes both israel and palestine as geopolitical entities to users who search on either of those terms the only purpose this putative vote serves is to drive traffic to the named nongoogle affiliated site last updated august

public post narasi hujan es tol cipularang penjelasan lokasi kejadian instanbul turki bukan indonesia rain hail and high winds in turkish city lead to floods collapsed wall at cemetery and explosion at port hujan hujan es angin kencang kota turki menyebabkan banjir tembok runtuh kuburan ledakan pelabuhan google translate referensi injuries as hailstones as large as golfballs sweep istanbul rain hail and high winds in turkish city lead to floods collapsed wall at cemetery and explosion at port istanbul hit by hailstones the size of golfballs during summer storm this article is months old shares associated press in istanbul thursday july bst last modified on friday july bst a severe summer storm in istanbul has left at least three people injured with heavy rain hail and strong winds knocking down trees and a stone wall and flooding streets in the turkish city the ntv television channel said part of a stone wall surrounding a cemetery for the christian armenian community had been demolished in thursdays storm hurting two people footage showed rescue crews and residents helping each other to remove the stones looking for people who may have been trapped beneath the rubble winds also toppled a large crane that landed on oil barrels at a port causing an explosion and a fire the staterun anadolu agency reported at least one person was injured in the fire which was later brought under control a small depot also caught fire after being hit by lightning heavy rainfall disrupted the evening rush hour traffic stranding vehicles in flooded streets delays were reported at istanbuls main airport and some planes were diverted to other airports ntv showed people leaving a bus that was stranded in a flooded underpass and walking to safety through waisthigh waters hailstones the size of golfballs damaged some windows and car windshields turkish authorities temporarily closed down the eurasia road tunnel which connects istanbuls asian and european sides under the bosphorus strait as a precaution it was the second time in days that heavy rain inundated the streets of istanbul and caused havoc in the metropolis topics turkey natural disasters and extreme weather news artikel asli httpsgooglnkrlf cedera hujan es besar bola golf menyapu istanbul hujan hujan es angin kencang kota turki menyebabkan banjir tembok runtuh kuburan ledakan pelabuhan istanbul terkena hujan es seukuran bola golf badai musim panas artikel berumur bulan shares associated press istanbul kamis juli bst terakhir dimodifikasi hari jumat juli pukul bst badai musim panas parah istanbul menyebabkan tiga orang terluka hujan lebat hujan es angin kencang meruntuhkan pepohonan dinding batu jalanjalan banjir kota turki saluran televisi ntv mengatakan sebagian dinding batu mengelilingi sebuah kuburan komunitas kristen armenia dihancurkan badai hari kamis menyakiti orang rekaman menunjukkan awak penyelamat warga saling membantu membuang batu mencari orangorang mungkin terjebak bawah reruntuhan angin menggulingkan sebuah derek besar mendarat atas tong minyak sebuah pelabuhan menyebabkan ledakan api badan anadolu dikelola negara melaporkan satu orang terluka api kemudian terkendali sebuah depot kecil terbakar diserang petir curah hujan deras mengganggu lalu lintas jam sibuk mengendarai kendaraan jalanjalan banjir penundaan dilaporkan terjadi bandara utama istanbul beberapa pesawat dialihkan bandara ntv menunjukkan orangorang meninggalkan sebuah bus terdampar underpass banjir berjalan menuju tempat aman melalui perairan setinggi pinggang batubatu batu seukuran bola golf merusak beberapa jendela kaca depan mobil pihak berwenang turki menutup terowongan jalan eurasia menghubungkan sisi asia eropa istanbul bawah selat bosphorus tindakan pencegahan kedua kalinya hari hujan deras soros diperkirakan rp miliar berbagai kebijakan ht kuat dugaan soros setia melindunginya belakang layar termasuk ht membeli saham bentoel sctv astra internasional pt artha graha investama sentral agis soros memberikan konsultasi ht fokus bisnis media cetak televisi alasannya prospek bisnisnya cukup besar atas saran soros hary tanoe lantas melepas saham sctv membeli rcti bimantara kemudian memborong saham tpi sekarang mnc tv global tv saham ht lalu melebar music televisi indonesia radio trijaya arh harian seputar indonesia tabloid gennie majalah trust sekarang majalah sindo konsep ditawarkan soros menguasai industri media bisnis terbantu termasuk mampu menembus dunia politik usai meraup keuntungan industri media soroshary tanoe lalu membidik pasar telekomunikasi layanan seluler fren lihat presenter indonesia rosianna silalahi sctv putra nababan rcti pernah mewawancarai presiden as rosianna presiden bush putra presiden obama ditengarai keberhasilan presenter terlepas jasa soros sejak awal hary tanoe dipersiapkan yahudi as menguasai indonesia peroleh kuliah ottawa university kanada ht berpengalaman bermain saham bursa toronto soal terjunnya hary tanoe dunia politik bukan kebetulan meski diakui langkah ht tersebut mendapat perlawanan kecil kaum nasionalis bukan kebetulan ht menjanjikan modal rp miliar kader nansional demokrat nasdem bertarung pemilu legislatif kepiawaian ht menggoreng pundipundi keluarga cendana titik prabowo bambang soeharto melalui pt bhakti investama berasal soros kesimpulannya soros hary tanoe memang memiliki kisah mirip disebut hary tanoe sudibyo anak didik sang miliarder soros hary tanoesoedibjo hary memegang beberapa jabatan strategis berbagai perusahaan terkemuka indonesia ditunjuk presiden direktur pt global mediacom tbk sejak tahun sebelumnya menjabat wakil presiden komisaris perusahaan tersebut pendiri pemegang saham presiden eksekutif grup pt bhakti investama tbk sejak tahun hary memegang berbagai posisi perusahaanperusahaan lainnya diantaranya presiden direktur pt media nusantara citra tbk mnc pt rajawali citra televisi indonesia rcti sejak tahun komisaris pt mobile telecom tbk indovision perusahaanperusahaan lainnya bawah bendera grup perusahaan global mediacom bhakti investama hary aktif bendahara komite olahraga nasional indonesia koni berulang kali menjadi pembicara berbagai seminar menjadi dosen tamu bidang keuangan perusahaan investasi manajemen strategis program magister berbagai perguruan tinggi tahun forbes merilis daftar orang terkaya indonesia pengusaha hary tanoesoedibjo menduduki peringkat total nilai kekayaan dimilikinya sebesar us miliar kontroversi politik bulan juni hary tanoesoedibjo diinterogasi komisi pemberantasan korupsi kpk sehubungan kasus korupsi tommy hindratno pejabat pajak kantor pajak sidoarjo james gunarjo diyakini terhubung pt bhakti investama tbk perusahaan milik hary tanoesoedibjo tommy diduga bertindak perantara memastikan penggantian sebesar rp miliar bentuk pajak perusahaan diduga membayar lebih kpk menggerebek kantor pt bhakti investama tbk menara mnc jakarta pusat pt agis terletak gedung sama mana pt bhakti investama tbk memiliki saham pt agis tahun ht merupakan adik kandung hartono tanoesoedibjo bambang rudijanto tanoesoedibjo mempunyai seorang istri bernama liliana tanaja tanoesoedibjo memiliki lima orang anak angela herliani tanoesoedibjo muda bangsa indonesia menurutnya partai nasdem sendiri kader partainya terdiri kaum generasi anak muda bangsa januari ht mengumumkan resmi mengundurkan diri partai nasdem dikarenakan adanya perbedaan nasdem berhasil lolos verifikasi komisi pemilihan umum kpu resmi menjadi partai politik peserta pemilu nomor urutan nomor urutan pertama keluar nasdem ht resmi bergabung partai hanura tanggal februari terdapat seorang yahudi adam chesnoff cukup aktif mendukung aktivitas kaum zionis maupun luar israel pria kelahiran yerusalem meraih gelar sarjananya universitas tel aviv israel menjabat komisaris mnc translate httpsgooglcxats sunday july will phone explode if you use it while charging what are the causes of phone explosion answer phone explosion while charging photo in circulation on social media showing a person who purportedly got burnt to death from a phone that exploded while being charged and used original source unknown almost every year the photo of someone who got charred or whose hand got burnt or destroyed by a phone explosion hits the net and causes panic stories that are usually not sourced from any real media usually follow the photos and warn against using of mobile phones while charging such info usually spread like wild fire as family and friends share immediately they receive in the spirit of care while caring is it is also important to do at least a little research into popular infos in circulation before you share so i began making research and it didnt take me up to mins to spot the dont use phone while charging myth of course if they say dont use phone while charging it means no calls no games no watching videos no browsing no reading ebooks nothing this means anytime you plug your phone it must be left alone i cant even imagine the truth is that phones do explode at times rare occasions but this is hardly ever because of charging a phone while using it the remote causes of phone explosion have not been linked to charging but charging with the the wrong charger in fact the message of not using phone while charging is a modern myth according to mashables article on myths about phone batteries it is established that there is nothing wrong with using your phone while it charges also every new phone comes with a manual ive never read such warning in any phones manual have you saying dont use phone while charging is like saying dont use your laptop while charging the possible causes for phone explosion are these inferior phones buying inferior and cheap phones that flood the third world markets is a sure way to expose yourself to danger such devices are made with substandard materials and connections could go wrong and acids may leak or sparks occur however it is also disheartening that even the big brands can make bad phones sometimes samsung had the disastrous release of samsung galaxy note last year that exploded in peoples pockets even while not charging problem was that they built it with a battery that was in conflict with other parts of the phone the lesson we learnt from samsung galaxy note explosion is when new phones hit the market allow weeks or a month to pass and watch reviews before rushing to buy inferior battery andcharger this is the major cause if you lose the original charger of your phone try and get another original same with battery if you buy inferior your would expose yourself to avoidable danger in fact the first fatal phone explosion on record was due to fake charger you can also get a good charger that is not from your phone manufacturer but always be wary of cheap and off beat stuff bad power source although this is hypothetical since other home appliances can develop fault or even burst into flames when the power source is bad and shaky the phone should do same too wet phone charging if your phone is wet as in it fell into water or you got drenched by the rain dont charge your phone till you have dried it completely water and electricity can react and start off a spart or explosion so why is the story of phone explosion while charging so popular there are scary reasons behind this myth mashable wrote people believe that using a phone while charging will make the phone explode or electrocute the user that actually happened to a chinese flight attendant named ma ailun in july when she used her iphone while it was charging however reports say its because ailun was using a thirdparty charger not an original apple charger if youre using the manufacturerapproved charger and battery you should be fine so thats it any time you get a popular info on social media or blogs kindly research before spreading will you share this i dont know you are welcome bahasa asli english sumber httpswebfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

kartu sim xl indosat smarfren telkomsel disadap badan intelijen as investigasi dilakukan operator ismail menegaskan ditemukan indikasi penyadapan kartu sim tersebut operator mengklaim penyedia kartu sim gunakan memenuhi gsm security standard brti meminta operator seluler melakukan investigasi internal masingmasing terkait munculnya isu penyadapan akhirakhir sesuai laporan investigasi internal operator seluler ditemukan adanya kebocoran sim card sebagaimana diduga tambah ismail sumber media sosial narasi kemenkominfo melalui badan regulasi telekomunikasi indonesia brti menyatakan menerima laporan investigasi operator seluler terkait dugaan penyadapan kartu sim buatan gemalto hutchinson xl axiata indosat telkomsel badan intelijen as national security agency nsa government communication headquarter gchq silahkan disadap smsku cuma sama pemilik tanaman jengkol waku buat chat pelanggan jengkol fbku cuma buat nulis status jengkol internetan tau harga jengkol penjelasan kabar penyadapan pihak asing membuat resah masyarakat indonesia salah satunya isu penyadapan kartu sim buatan gemalto terdiri hutchinson hi xl axiata indosat telkomsel kartu sim gemalto dikabarkan disadap badan intelijen as national security agency nsa government communication headquarter gchq kementerian komunikasi informatika kemenkominfo melalui badan regulasi telekomunikasi indonesia brti menerima laporan investigasi operator seluler terkait dugaan penyadapan kartu sim buatan gemalto dikutip tribunnewscom xl hi hutchinson indonesia telkomsel pakai gemalto termasuk indosat pakai sesuai laporan masingmasing terang kepala humas kemenkominfo ismail cawidu pesan singkat kompastekno senin investigasi dilakukan operator ismail menegaskan ditemukan indikasi penyadapan kartu sim tersebut operator mengklaim penyedia kartu sim gunakan memenuhi gsm security standard brti meminta operator seluler melakukan investigasi internal masingmasing terkait munculnya isu penyadapan akhirakhir sesuai laporan keajaiban terjadi hari iniamerika kanada melihat matahari sumber pesan siaran broadcast whatsapp narasi keajaiban terjadi hari amerika kanada melihat matahari inilah yg disebut hunters moon terjadi perubahan orbit matahari terbenam bulan terbit bersamaan keduanya berhadapan satu sama sudut derajat tertentu bulan memantulkan cahaya matahari terangnya terasa matahari penjelasan definisi dikenal bulan optimis darah istilah bulan pemburu digunakan tradisional merujuk bulan purnama muncul selama bulan oktober didahului munculnya harvest moon merupakan bulan purnama paling dekat ekuinoks musim gugur jatuh tanggal september bulan hunter biasanya muncul bulan oktober empat tahun sekali terbit november nama berasal negaranegara bagian pertama amerika utara disebut bulan oktober pengganggu terjemahan poin artinya rusa english deer catatan informasi situs snopescom hoax mulai beredar november referensi httpsgooglsoqhg a full moon in october is known as a hunters moon credit david haworthstargazingnet astronomy guide to space what is a hunters moon article written jun updated oct by matt williams if you live in the northern hemisphere than stargazing during the early autumn months can a bit tricky during certain times in these seasons the stars planets and milky way will be obscured by the presence of some very beautiful full moons but if youre a fan of moongazing then youre in luck because it is also around this time the month of october that people looking to the night sky will have the chance to see what is known as a hunters moon a slight variation on a full moon the hunters moon has long been regarded as a significant event in traditional folklore and a subject of interest for astronomers definition also known as a sanguine or blood moon the term hunters moon is used traditionally to refer to a full moon that appears during the month of october it is preceded by the appearance of a harvest moon which is the full moon closest to the autumnal equinox which falls on the nd or rd of september the hunters moon typically appears in october except once every four years when it doesnt appear until november the name dates back to the first nations of north america it is socalled because it was during the month of october when the deers had fatted themselves over the course of the summer that hunters tracked and killed prey by autumn moonlight stockpiling food for the coming winter full moon rising over northwest georgia on june nd credit and copyright stephen rahn full moon rising over northwest georgia on june nd credit and copyright stephen rahn characteristics although typically the moon rises minutes later each day things are different for the hunters moon as well as the harvest moon both of these moons usually rise minutes later on each successive night which means that sunset and moonrise are not far apart this means there is prolonged periods of light during this time of the the year which is the reason why these moons have traditionally been used by hunters and farmers to finish their work this difference between the timing of the sunset and moonrise is due to its orbit meaning that the angle the moon makes with the horizon is narrower during this time of year the hunters moon is generally not bigger or brighter than any of the other full moons thus the only difference between it and other full moons is the that the time between sunset and moonrise is shorter history of observation because the approach of winter signaled the possibility of going hungry in preindustrial times the hunters moon was generally accorded with special honor historically serving as an important feast day in both northern europe and among many native american tribes traditionally native american hunters used the full moon of october to stalk deer and to spot foxes at night as they prepared for the coming winter because the fields were traditionally reaped in late september or early october hunters could easily see foxes and other animals that came out to glean from the fallen grains the hunters moon is accorded similar significance in europe where it was also seen as a prime time to hunt during the postharvest prewinter period when conditions were optimal for spotting prey however the term did not enter into usage for europeans until after they made contact with indigenous americans and began colonizing north america the first recorded mentions of a hunters moon began in the early th century the entry in the oxford english dictionary for hunters moon cites a edition of the british apollo where the term is attributed to the country people the names are now referred to regularly by american sources where they are often popularly attributed to the native americans in india the harvest festival of sharad purnima which marks the end of the monsoon season is celebrated on the full moon day of the lunar month of ashvin septemberoctober there is a traditional celebration of the moon during this time that is known as the kaumudi celebration which translated means moonlight the harvest festival of shrad purnima is celebrated on the full moon day of the hindu lunar month of ashvin credit httpdfwhindutempleorg the harvest festival of shrad purnima is celebrated on the full moon day of the hindu lunar month of ashvin credit dfwhindutempleorg interesting facts sometimes the harvest moon is mistaken for the hunters moon because once every four years or so the harvest moon is in october instead of september when that happens the hunters moon is in november traditionally each months full moon has been given a name although these names differ according to the source other full moons of interest include the wolf moon in january the strawberry moon in june the sturgeon moon in august the cold moon in december and the pink moon in april all of the full moons have different characteristics due to the location of the ecliptic ie the path of the sun at the time of each the hunters moon is also associated with feasting in the northern hemisphere some native american tribes and some places in western europe held a feast day this feast day the feast of the hunters moon was not been held since the s however the feast of the hunters moon is a yearly festival in lafayette indiana which has been held in late september or early october every year since we have many interesting articles about the moon here at universe today for example here are some about the red moon and a rundown of what a full moon is all about for more information check out the page on the hunters moon at nightskyinfo and full moon names and meanings courtesy of the farmers almanac astronomy cast has an interesting episode on the subject episode the moon part i sources wikipedia full moon nightskyinfo the hunters moon farmers almanac full moon names and their meanings share this click to share on facebook opens in new windowclick to share on pocket opens in new windowclick to share on twitter opens in new windowclick to share on google opens in new windowclick to share on linkedin opens in new windowclick to share on tumblr opens in new windowclick to share on pinterest opens in new windowclick to share on reddit opens in new windowclick to email this to a friend opens in new windowclick to print opens in new window by matt williams matt williams is the curator of universe today

kerajaan arab saudi menetapkan habib rizieq keturunan rasulullah dilakukan penelusuran melalui mensin pencari ditemukan pernyataan personal institusi berwenang media kredibel memberitakan kerajaan arab saudi tetapkan habib rizieq keturunan rasulullah selengkapnya bagian penjelasan referensi sumber blog httpsyesmuslimblogspotcoidkerajaanarabsauditeta facebook httpswwwfacebookcommuhamadhuda narasikerajaan arab saudi tetapkan habib rizieq keturunan rasulullahimam besar ummat islam _assayyid addai ilallaah alarifbillaah_ habib muhammad rizieq shihab dinyatakan ditetapkan pemerintahan arab saudi melalui juru bicara kerajaan raja salman beliau hrs ditetapkan _keturunan habiballaah rasulullah_ muhammad shallallahu alaihi wa sallam _ke_ beliau mendapat seluruh fasilitas kebutuhan kehidupan dunia dipergunakan sepuasnya dilayani kerajaan arab saudi termasuk hrs tinggal saudi sesuka keinginannya maa syaa allah berikut nasabnya hingga _rasulullah shallallahu alaihi wa sallam_ habib muhammad rizieq bin syihab bin husein bin muhammad bin husein bin abdullah bin husein bin muhammad bin syeikh bin muhammad bin ali bin muhammad bin ahmad syihabuddin alasghar bin abdurrahman alqadhi bin ahmad syihabuddin alakbar bin abdurrahman bin syeikh ali bin abu bakar assakran bin abdurrahman assegaf bin muhammad maulad daawilah bin ali bin alwi ibnul faqih bin muhammad alfaqihil muqaddam bin ali walidil faqih bin muhammad shahib murbath bin ali khala qasam bin alwi bin muhammad bin alwi ubaidillah bin ahmad almuhajir bin isa annaqib bin muhammad djamaluddin bin ali aluraidhi bin jafar asshadiq bin muhammad albaqir bin ali zainal abidin bin husein assibth bin ali bin abi thalib wa fathimah azzahra _binta rasulullah_ muhammad _shallallahu alaihi wa sallam_ _yaa rabb_ ditengah hujatan fitnah caci maki beliau hrs engkau angkat derajat kemuliaan engkau tunjukkan singa dakwah penerus perjuangan kekasihmu nabi muhammad _shallallahu alaihi wa sallam_ semoga allah subhanahu wa taala senantiasa berikan kesehatan perlindungan istiqomah imam besar ummat islam kini ummat islam indonesia ikhlas menerima hrs ummat islam dunia inikah akhir zaman dipersiapkan allah _subhanahu wa taala_ skemaskema phishing intinya penggunapengguna facebook aktif melakukan bahkan menyadari melakukannya membuka pintu memperbolehkan pembajak mengakses akunakun pengguna sadar keamanan perlu khawatir peretas tibatiba merebut kendali akunakun cara pencegahanpencegahan dilakukan terakhir diperbarui juli diterbitkan pertama kali mei hacker rumors about hackers posting insulting and sexual messages on your friends facebook walls in your name are old and unfounded david mikkelson updated jul claim hackers seize control of facebook accounts to post insulting messages on the walls of friends of those whose accounts theyve taken over false example collected via facebook august warning everybody new hackers on facebook and what they write is aggression from you and its insulting its really nasty and it appears to come from you you do not see it but your friends do one result of this can be that you will be deleted on your friends list i just want to say if you get something that is offensive malicious vulgar etc it is absolutely not from me copy this and let your friends know if you get anything like this from me please tell me and report it immediately to facebook apparently it can come in messages too everyone knows me and knows how i am so please dont be fooled please do not share copy and paste only origin false warnings about hackers invading facebook accounts to post insulting messages to the walls of friends of the rightful owners of those accounts have been circulating in email and on social networking sites since at least facebook accounts can be retooled by hackers to issue missives their actual owners would never send such as the posting of derogatory notes on friends walls but the mechanism whereby malcontents gain such control is one of social engineering rather than computer wizardry theres no special programming trick the illintentioned have mastered that allows them to seize control of social media accounts no way for hackers to randomly access facebook accounts and use them to send insulting andor sexual messages in others names socalled facebook pirates might be able to achieve a similar effect but they do so by creating new accounts that impersonate existing accounts not by hacking into the latter instead it comes down to a matter of tricking the unsuspecting into unlocking the door through which invaders gain the access they seek those who lose control of their accounts do so through unintentionally installing rogue facebook applications or they fall victim to clickjacking schemes when they click on proffered links misleadingly labeled as innocuous or alluring items such as like buttons or links to videos that sounds interesting when in fact they are really quite different critters or as was the case in the november facebook porn video attacks described in further detail on our page about that incursion they are duped into executing malicious javascript code in their browsers address bar or they fall prey to phishing schemes the bottom line is that facebook users have to actively do something even if they arent aware theyre doing it to open the door and allow hijackers to access their accounts securityconscious users need not worry that hackers will suddenly seize control of their facebook accounts no matter what precautions they may take last updated july originally published may catatan pernah dibahas httpsgooglxfabb sumber httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

cyclone ockhi has created a lot of havoc and damage in southern states of india and now it is heading up to maharashtra and gujarat its effects have already started with a dip in temperature and unseasonal rainfall but to curb the effects many precautionary measures are in process a few spells of rain or thundershowers are likely to occur in the city and suburbs in next hours the imd said after the alert by the weather department the state government soon announced a holiday for schools and colleges in mumbai sindhudurg thane raigad and palghar districts cyclone ockhi mumbai rains surprise residents twitterati reacts amidst all the climate change chaos social media sites and apps are abuzz with videos of hailstorms in mumbai pune expressway and another video of sea link is also doing rounds on the internet the terrifying footage showcases tides covering mumbais bandra worli sea link there are reports of hailstorms but both the videos are deemed fake it is even doing the rounds as goas kolva beach here is the fake video of the hailstorm at mumbaipune expressway hailstorm in mumbai pune highway pictwittercomrdcbptmu aggressive indian bharat_builder december here is the fake video of mumbai sea link high tide many people replied to the tweet how these videos are old and fake with proper reasons as well for the uninitiated twowheelers are not allowed on mumbai sea link bridge and the video showcases person on a scooter plus the sea links tall white cables are easily identifiable it is sad to see that people do not verify any media and start sharing videos and the same spread panic among citizens what are your views on these circulations of fake videos during distressed times let us know in the comments below published date december pm ist updated date december pm ist bahasa asli httpsgooglcizxc httpsgoogltfj bandraworli sea link sumber httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

bayi menangis terasnya malam hari menelpon polisi larut malam merasa aneh polisi memberitahu apapun terjadi jangan buka pintunya wanita tersebut kemudian mengatakan sepertinya bayi merangkak dekat islam httpsgooglymukza the first and the only mosque in north korea no the first and the only mosque in north korea arrahman mosque hosts shiite and sunni muslims in the capital of north korea near irans embassy as abna reported there is just one mosque in pyongyang the capital of north korea built by the iranian embassy located near the embassy building the mosque named alrahman drew inspiration from shiite architecture the iranian embassy allows other muslims to take part in such religious activities as congressional prayers friday prayers and other religious ceremonies every friday prayers most muslims would pray at arrahman mosque regardless of their differences in sect an indonesian citizen has shared the mosques photos on instagram it is said that there is no freedom of religion in north korea and the communist government doesnt allow unauthorized religious groups to perform their religious activities some religious minorities like christians and buddhists possess menghentikan penyebaran cerita palsu google translate httpsgooglpwakq the israeli policeman strangling palestinian boy hoax debunked posted by dr adrian wong date december in conspiracy theory crimes tragedies hoaxes scams religion war military matters leave a comment after us president donald trump declared that the us will recognise jerusalem as the capital of israel it sparked a flurry of lies and misinformation on both sides the latest one by the propalestinian side is going viral a video showing an israeli policeman strangling a palestinian boy to his death unfortunately for the propalestinian side this is yet another hoax a fake story that denigrates the palestinian cause and will inevitably reinforce the perception that every antiisraeli post is a pallywood hoax and that nothing the palestinians and their supporters say is factual the israeli policeman strangling palestinian boy hoax someone called kamal jambu started sharing a video purportedly showing an israeli policeman strangling a palestinian boy to death here is his post in malay and the english translation seorang lelaki polis israel mencekik kanakkanak palestin hingga mati sebarkan video youtube google padam kj wkpt an israeli policeman strangled a palestinian child until he died spread this video before youtube and google deletes it kj wkpt it went viral with over shares in less than a day the video incited many to curse the jews israelis and america not one person bothered to factcheck before commenting not one the truth the video kamal jambu claimed was of an israeli policeman strangling a palestinian boy to his death did not happen in israel in fact it did not even happen in the middle east that video clip was originally published by the swedish newspaper sydsvenskan in february it actually shows a swedish security guard at the malmÃ¶ train station sitting on a moroccan boy and holding his hands over his mouth the year old boy can be heard reciting the shahada in fright malmÃ¶ central station metro arkitekter rafael palomo metro architects the guard detained the boy and his year old friend after they were caught travelling without a ticket according to a witness source the local sweden it didnt seem like the boy was doing anything but the guard just threw him to the floor he the guard looked like he weighed kilos but he just sat on him and hit his head against the ground the swedish police received twelve complaints about the incident and began investigations into the alleged assault by the guard in the video and another guard involved in the incident the he was shot in the heart by an israeli soldier is actually a still from a movie claim a photograph shows a palestinian boy after he was shot in the heart by an israeli soldier during the first intifada rating false origin in january an image purportedly showing a young palestinian boy after he was shot in the heart by an israeli soldier was recirculated on social media the unarmed palestinian boy just after being shot by an israeli police giving his last and freezing look at his killerwhy doesnt this picture become viral and shared by people on their facebook wallwhy why why israeli boy this image has been circulating for several years and is often attached to a more detailed claim which asserted that this is a photograph was taken between and during the first intifada twitter image this image does not show the death of a young palestinian boy rather it is a still frame taken from the film mamlakat alnaml kingdom of ants the scene depicted in the image can be glimpsed at the mark of the movies trailer kingdom of ants was directed by chawki mejri and was first released in tunisia in march palestinians have deeprooted traditions although they have not yet been able to beat their oppressors they have not yet learned the philosophy of defeat their enemy saw this in them and director chawki almejri wanted to show it to the entire world mamlakat alnaml the kingdom of ants coming soon to lebanese theaters is a poetic portrayal of palestine in cinema the film does not document the palestinian struggle rather it weaves legends that touch the heart and not
