ternyata indonesia dibodohkan air mineral terkait pihak produsen aqua klarifikasi dilansir aquacom produsen minuman kemasan aqua merupakan air mineral sumber air berasal pegunungan vulkanik jadi air hujan jatuh terserap lapisan pegunungan mengalami mineralisasi alami nah proses tersebut beberapa jenis mineral alami fluorida kandungan tersebut salah satu gizi dibutuhkan tubuh jadi aqua menegaskan air munim kemasannya aman dikonsumsi tak pihak aqua menegaskan kementerian kesehatan badan kesehatan dunia who menetapkan miligram kandungan fluoride aman dikunsumsi diminum kenyamanan konsumen produsen aqua selalu memantau berkala mengenai kandungan fluoride air kemasan miliknya produk amdk aqua mendapatkan sertifikat sni dipantau lembaga sertifikasi produk fluoride merupakan kandungan mineral alami terdapat sumber air mineral berkhasiat tubuh salah satu zat gizi mikro dikonsumsi jumlah cukup fluoride bermanfaat mencegah karies gigi berperan penting pembentukan email gigi anakanak tulis aqua rilisnya perlu diketahui pemerintah menetapkan batasan kandungan fluorida air minum melalui peraturan menteri kesehatan republik indonesia no menkesperiv persyaratan kualitas air minum lebih mgl peraturan menteri kesehatan ri no tahun angka kecukupan gizi dianjurkan bangsa indonesia kandungan fluorida air mineral diatur sni air minum kemasan bersifat wajib melalui peraturan menteri narasi tahun melakukan penelitian akhirnya harvard university menambah temuan betapa bahayanya air mineral mengandung flourida terdapat air mineral aqua kepunyaan danone aqua kini sahamnya dibeli danone mengandung zat flourida termuan terkini harvard university air mineral fluorida mengurangi iq anakanak sebuah pertanyaan besar danone melalui aqua menanamkan zat berbahaya minuman anakanak indonesia target apa puluhan tahun mendatang temuan membuktikan air fluorida berbagai negara mengonsumsinya termasuk indonesia ditemukan fakta anakanak tinggal daerah air mengandung konsentrasi tinggi fluorida meminum air mineral kandungan flourida indinesia salah satunya koefisien intelektualnya sangat rendah melihat sebuah unsur kesengajaan kemudian pihak danone menggunakan zidane idola kampanye air mineral indonesia disebabkan zidane muslim penduduk indonesia mayoritas muslimoleh ilmuwan universitas harvard melakukan studi besar mengumpulkan hasil penelitian sebelumnya periode tahun mana kerusakan hippocampus mengurangi kadar lipid plakat pembentukan betaamiloid kelainan terjadi penyakit alzheimer eksaserbasi cedera kerusakan sistem pertahanan antioksidan peningkatan aluminium akumulasi fluoride kelenjar pineal kesemuanya didalam otak manusia studi menemukan fluorida berlebih didalam tubuh menyebabkan gejalagejala berikut hiperaktif kelesuan gangguan otot radang sendi mineral aqua kepunyaan danone aqua kini sahamnya dibeli danone mengandung zat flourida termuan terkini harvard university air mineral fluorida mengurangi iq anakanak sebuah pertanyaan besar danone melalui aqua menanamkan zat berbahaya minuman anakanak indonesia target apa puluhan tahun mendatang temuan membuktikan air fluorida berbagai negara mengonsumsinya termasuk indonesia ditemukan fakta anakanak tinggal daerah air mengandung konsentrasi tinggi fluorida meminum air mineral kandungan flourida indinesia salah satunya koefisien intelektualnya sangat rendah melihat sebuah unsur besar mengumpulkan hasil penelitian sebelumnya periode tahun mana mempelajari efek air fluorida anakanak hasilnya menunjukkan fluorida mempengaruhi perkembangan otak anakanak tingkat lebih besar gejalagejala berikut hiperaktif kelesuan gangguan otot radang sendi demensia aktifnya enzim menghambat lebih enzim menghambat pembentukan antibodi kematian sel patah tulang beberapa jenis kanker tilapia mutant fish nila ikan mutan bottom line tilapia is popular for good reasonits inexpensive and widely available plus it goes with everything and though its not rich in omegas its a good source of lean protein and is better for you than fatty meats like burgers and bacon it can clearly be a part of a healthy diet if you like it though as with all fish we recommend you vary your intake and look for responsibly farmed or wildcaught sources you can use seafood guides from such organizations as the monterey bay aquarium and edf as a starting point but you still have to ask questions of your fishmonger or waitperson or chef and check packages of frozen products if you want to know if the fish meets standards for sustainability see inset above some companies post this information on their websites intinya nila populer alasan baikini murah banyak tersedia ditambah berjalan segalanya meski kaya omega sumber protein lean baik lebih baik daging berlemak burger daging asap jelas menjadi bagian makanan sehat suka meskipun semua ikan sebaiknya memvariasikan asupan mencari sumber bertani ditangkap liar menggunakan panduan makanan laut organisasi monterey bay aquarium edf titik awal mengajukan pertanyaan penjual ikan waitperson koki memeriksa paket produk beku tahu ikan memenuhi standar keberlanjutan lihat inset atas beberapa perusahaan memposting informasi situs web google translate httpsgooglstkr source httpsgoogldoqky shared times when screenshot was taken httpsgoogljgqs tap or click to see others who also share public posts question from one of the member of this forum ahssf anti hoax slander and sedition forum narration stop eating this mutant stop eating this fake ass fish tilapia this fish is boneless has no skin and cant be overcooked you cant find tilapia in the wild its being harvest in artificial fish farms the algae lake plant or replaced by gmo soy corn eating tilapia is worse than eating bacon or hamburger dioxin is found in this fish cancers are caused by this toxin dioxin which can take up to years to clear your body of it once consumed please share this with others this fish is a mutant its killing our families various other narrations explanation bottom line tilapia is popular for good reasonits inexpensive and widely available plus it goes with everything and though its not rich in omegas its a good source of lean protein and is better for you than fatty meats like burgers and bacon it can clearly be a part of a healthy diet if you like it though as with all fish we recommend you vary your intake and look for responsibly farmed or wildcaught sources you can use seafood guides from such organizations as the monterey bay aquarium and edf as a starting point but you still have to ask questions of your fishmonger or waitperson or chef and check packages of frozen products if you want to know if the fish meets standards for sustainability see inset above some companies post this information on their websites reference httpsgooglffsbsz the truth about tilapia by berkeley wellness april famed as the food of pharaohs in ancient times tilapia is the worlds second most farmed fish after carpand the fourth most consumed type of seafood in the us after shrimp tuna and salmon the term tilapia actually refers to several related fish species that originated in the middle east and africa but are now farmed all over the world though its production is growing in the us most of the tilapia we eat here is imported from asia and latin america if you eat fish you have probably already had tilapia sometimes called st peters fish even if you didnt know it thats because tilapialike other inexpensive fishis often fraudulently sold in markets and restaurants as red snapper grouper tuna or other expensive species in contrast theres far less chance of baitandswitch if you order tilapia itself nicknamed aquatic chicken this fastgrowing fish is both lauded as an excellent source of protein thats vital for building muscle and denounced as a food thats worse than bacon see inset at bottom of article advocates assert that tilapia farming can help relieve pressure on the worlds diminishing wild fish populations while opponents cite health and environmental issues whos right the answer is not so black and white the nutrition angle tilapia is a whitefleshed freshwater fish thats mild in flavor which makes it appealing to people who dont like fishy fish its relatively low in calories per ounce serving cooked and rich in protein grams but if youre looking for a lot of hearthealthy omega fats tilapia is not a good choice it has very little fat to grams per serving of which less than grams is omegas in contrast both wild and farmed salmon have more than grams of omegas per serving farmed tilapia is particularly low in omegas because its diet is predominantly corn and soymealbased in contrast to the omegarich algae and other aquatic plants that wild tilapia feed on the environment angle fish farms when not properly managed are infamous for having adverse effects on the environment which include the polluting of water and the spread of disease to wild fish when farmed fish escape their pens overseas tilapia farms like salmon and shrimp farms tend to have a bad reputation though new regulations and certification programs may slowly be changing that according to the monterey bay aquariums seafood watch programwhich makes recommendations for purchasing seafood thats fished or farmed in environmentally sustainable waysfarmed tilapia from the us canada and ecuador are best choices and though much if not most fish from asia get a red light seafood watch upgraded tilapia produced in china and taiwan from its avoid list in to its good alternative list in these fish are still not considered a best choice however because of continuing concerns about waste management and the use of chemicals similarly the seafood selector from edf environmental defense fund gives tilapia from the us and ecuador a best ecorating and lists tilapia from china and taiwan as okay tilapia farms in the us and canada rate well because they typically use closed recirculating tank systems which alleviate problems of water pollution and fish escapes in ecuador tilapia are typically farmed in freshwater ponds at low density meaning the fish are not crowded which reduces disease the need for chemicals and water pollution and heres a plus for tilapia farming because tilapia are fed mostly a grainbased diet rather than fishmeal production does not further deplete wild fish stocks does your tilapia pass the test a growing number of tilapia farms are getting thirdparty certification from such organizations as the global aquaculture alliance aquaculture stewardship council and naturland the same is true of shrimp catfish and other types of fish farms to be certified the farms must meet standards that take into account environmental and community issues animal welfare food safety and traceability among other factors tilapia farms must for instance be managed to control for escaped fish drug and chemical use and soil and water conservation many major retailers in the us sell certified tilapia and other fish for example tilapia from sams club target walmart and darden restaurants among other large chains has best aquaculture practices bap certification from gaa meanwhile whole foods has developed its own responsibly farmed logo for seafood including tilapia which is backed by annual thirdparty audits of its suppliers you can check for these and other sustainability logos on frozen tilapia products or ask the fishmonger about the source of fresh tilapia the contaminant angle what about drug residues a major concern with most imported seafood tilapia is not exempt from contamination though this depends on where and how its farmed as we previously reported veterinary drug residues were detected in tilapia and other fish that were inspected by the us canada and the european union between and according to a paper in environmental science and technology and a paper in the journal of hazardous materials found antibiotic residues in farmed fish purchased in the us including tilapia from panama and china though levels were relatively low the authors note that the use of antibiotics in fish farming could nonetheless be contributing to the growing public health problem of drugresistant bacteria on the other hand an analysis in the openaccess journal of food processing technology in reported that of samples of imported tilapiamostly from latin americanone tested positive for antimicrobials chloramphenicol malachite green and gentian violet though results may have differed the researchers said had more samples from asia particularly china and vietnam been included this study also looked at mercury cadmium arsenic and lead in tilapia all samples had detectable residues of at least one of these heavy metals but at levels well below safety action thresholds set by the fda tilapias worse than bacon baloney tilapia may not be as hearthealthy as fatty fish like salmon because of its low omega levels but that hardly means its inherently unhealthy and worse than bacon as ludicrous headlines proclaimed following publication of a study in the journal of the american dietetic association in it reported that tilapia has high levels of polyunsaturated omega fatty acids relative to its omegasin a detrimental ratio of more than to though omega fats are essential for normal growth and brain function and are considered to be healthy fats because they lower ldl bad cholesterol high amounts or very high ratios of omega to omega may increase inflammation in the body this in theory may contribute to heart disease cancer and other chronic health problems but the importance of this fatty acid ratio for good health is debatable and evidence that lowering it reduces disease risk has been inconsistent in any case the amount of omegas in tilapia is too low less than grams per serving to be an issue americans get far more omegas from healthy foods like nuts and seeds than from tilapiaand even more from processed and fast foods such as chips cookies margarines and fries in fact the overall omega to omega ratio in the typical us diet is more on the order of to which is far higher than the supposedly harmful ratio in tilapia moreover its nonsensical to say tilapia is worse than bacon simply because it has more omegas the problem with bacon is not its omegas which are low anyway but rather its saturated fat calories and sodium the environmental working group considers tilapia one of the safer seafood choices in terms of mercury especially compared to fish such as tuna sea bass shark and swordfish according to its seafood calculator even if a pregnant or nursing woman eats three servings of tilapia a week and no other fish she will get less than percent of her weekly mercury limitbut also less than percent of her omega needs bottom line tilapia is popular for good reasonits inexpensive and widely available plus it goes with everything and though its not rich in omegas its a good source of lean protein and is better for you than fatty meats like burgers and bacon it can clearly be a part of a healthy diet if you like it though as with all fish we recommend you vary your intake and look for responsibly farmed or wildcaught sources you can use seafood guides from such organizations as the monterey bay aquarium and edf as a starting point but you still have to ask questions of your fishmonger or waitperson or chef and check packages of frozen products if you want to know if the fish meets standards for sustainability see inset above some companies post this information on their websites this debunk is also posted in english because hoax sources are from outside of indonesia sumber httpsgoogldoqky dibagikan kali tangkapan layar dibuat httpsgoogljgqs tap click melihat lainnya mungkin memiliki nila kadangkadang disebut ikan santo petrus bahkan mengetahuinya nilaseperti ikan murah lainnyasering dijual curang pasar restoran ikan kakap merah kerapu tuna spesies mahal lainnya journal of hazardous materials menemukan residu antibiotik ikan bertani dibeli as termasuk ikan nila panama china meskipun kadar relatif rendah penulis mencatat penggunaan antibiotik budidaya ikan tetap berkontribusi masalah kesehatan masyarakat semakin meningkat bakteri resistan obat sisi analisis akses terbuka journal of food processing teknologi tahun melaporkan sampel nila diimpor daging bacon balap ikan nila mungkin sepenting hati ikan berlemak salmon kadar omega rendahnya sama sekali berarti inheren sehat lebih buruk daging asap headline menggelikan diproklamirkan publikasi sebuah penelitian journal american dietetic association tahun melaporkan nila memiliki kadar asam lemak omega polyunsaturated tinggi dibandingkan omegadengan rasio merugikan lebih banding meskipun lemak omega sangat penting pertumbuhan normal fungsi otak dianggap lemak sehat menurunkan kolesterol ldl buruk jumlah tinggi rasio omega sangat tinggi omega meningkatkan peradangan tubuh teori menyebabkan penyakit jantung kanker masalah kesehatan kronis lainnya pentingnya rasio asam lemak kesehatan baik diperdebatkan bukti menurunkannya mengurangi risiko penyakit konsisten jumlah omega nila terlalu rendah kurang gram per porsi menjadi masalah orang amerika mendapatkan lebih banyak omega makanan sehat kacangkacangan bijibijian nila bahkan lebih banyak makanan olahan cepat keripik kue kering margarin kentang goreng kenyataannya rasio omega omega keseluruhan makanan khas as lebih sesuai urutan banding jauh lebih tinggi rasio nila dianggap merugikan nila masuk akal mengatakan nila memuat foto httpsgooglnfjngu rescuers race against time after massive ecuador quake catatan httpsgooglemkq tautan langsung file foto referensi httpsgooglnfjngu rescuers race against time after massive ecuador quake cbn news now playing cbns chuck holton reports from ecuador desperate search and rescue continues after massive ecuador quake death toll climbs in massive ecuador quake sunday morning prayer service for ecuador cbn news latin america correspondent javier bolanos reports on the quake that rocked ecuador the strongest earthquake to hit ecuador in years flattened buildings and buckled highways along its pacific coast killing hundreds and the death toll is still rising ecuadors government said late monday the death toll has now climbed to from the monstrous quake thousands were injured and tens of thousands had to be evacuated as the tremors struck along the pacific ring of fire how you can help give to cbn disaster relief the magnitude quake is the third quake to hit along the pacific coast after japan was hit by a quake thursday and a second one on friday more than were killed in japan in ecuador on sunday christians prayed for the victims of the nations worst earthquake in decades amid the rubble the desperate search for survivors continued time is running out to reach survivors still trapped my little nephew was inside one woman cried as rescuers nearby pulled bodies from collapsed homes businesses and even a hospital all in ruins in rome pope francis urged prayers for ecuador quake victims vice president jorge glas said there were deaths in the cities of manta portoviejo and guayaquil all several hundred miles from the center of the quake struck shortly after nightfall saturday glas called it the worst seismic movement we have faced in decades according to glas security forces medical staff and two mobile hospitals were being rushed to the most devastated areas with reinforcements arriving from colombia and mexico we know that there are citizens trapped under rubble that need to be rescued he said in a special tv and radio broadcast in portoviejo the temblor reduced houses to rubble brought down a local market in a nearby community and left streetlights and debris scattered helterskelter it was horrible this is the first time i feel an earthquake like this resident macontos bibi told afp still in shock a day later i thought my house was going to collapse in pedernales a town of near the quakes epicenter dozens of scared residents slept in the streets while men equipped with little more than car headlights tried to rescue survivors who could be heard trapped under rubble were trying to do the most we can but theres almost nothing we can do gabriel alcivar mayor of pedernales said alcivar pleaded for authorities to send earthmoving machines and emergency rescue workers to help find people amid the rubble he said looting had broken out amid the chaos but authorities were too busy trying to save lives to reestablish order this wasnt just a house that collapsed it was an entire town he said correa declared a national emergency and urged ecuadoreans to stay strong while authorities handle the disaster everything can be rebuilt but what cant be rebuilt are human lives and thats the most painful he said in a telephone call to state tv before departing rome straight for manta more than packages of food and nearly sleeping kits were being delivered electricity in manabi province the hardest hit remained mostly down as authorities focused on finding survivors compatriots unity strength and prayer glas told a throng of residents gathered in the streets of manta as he instructed them on how to look for survivors we need to be quiet so we can hear we cant use heavy machinery because it can be very tragic for those who are injured homes were reduced to rubble along the quakes path while in guayaquil a shopping centers roof fell down and a collapsed highway overpass crushed a car in manta the airport closed after the control tower collapsed injuring an air traffic control worker and a security guard alberto reynas was fishing off the coast of pedernales when giant waves violently rocked his boat it felt the same on sea as it did on land he said but he was shaken again when he returned to land to find the facade of his twostory home had fallen off into the streets he has been unable to communicate with members of his family and spent the night sleeping outdoors with neighbors keeping a close watch against thieves its pure sadness everything is destroyed he said us secretary of state john kerry expressed his heartfelt condolences to the quake victims and said washington was ready to assist and support ecuador luis quito said he spent the entire night delivering water to guests trapped under the rubble of a small fourstory hotel chimborazo owned by his fatherinlaw who was missing and he believed dead we hear screaming all through night said quito wailing as he expressed outrage over the slow response of authorities there are humans trapped below the terrace babies we need rescuers but nobody has arrived so far in the capital quito terrified people fled into the streets as the quake shook their buildings it knocked out electricity in several neighborhoods and a few homes collapsed but after a few hours power was being restored among those killed was the driver of a car crushed by an overpass that buckled in guayaquil the countrys most populous city the citys international airport was also briefly closed hydroelectric dams and oil pipelines in the opecmember nation were shut down as a precautionary measure but so there were no reports of damage to them towns near the epicenter were evacuated as a precautionary measure in case of hazardous tsunami waves but several hours later authorities said was safe for coastal residents to return to their homes ecuadors ally venezuela pledged humanitarian aid while neighbor colombia where the quake was also felt said it stands ready to help in any way possible the government is drawing on million in emergency funding from multilateral banks to rebuild correa said federica mogherini chief diplomat for the european union announced that it would help the south american country the us geological survey originally put the quake at a magnitude of then raised it to it had a depth of kilometers miles meanwhile miles across the pacific and on the other side of the ring of fire in japan twin earthquakes killed at least people and were injured in the quakes that hit the region near kumamoto city late thursday and early sunday collapsed roads and bridges slowed efforts to reach victims desperate for food water medicine the us military is now assisting japanese forces by airlifting in supplies operation blessing is helping in both countries in japan the disaster relief organization is providing generators water and food they are working closely with kumamoto harvest church and pastor koji nakamura whose church is in the city center close to the epicenter in ecuador operation blessing is setting up kitchens to serve meals to victims be sure to check back for updates on the latest on this story follow cbnnews on twitter cbn news on facebook and instagram sumber httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

tersebut narasi tolak radikalisme rizieq shihab diusir raja salman arab saudi kabar terbaru rizieq shihab datang negeri minyak arab saudi mendapat informasi indonesia rizieq buronan kepolisian ri alsaud sang raja tak negaranya dicap negara menyembunyikan buronan keputusan tegas sekaligus menjadi sikap penghormatan raja salman presiden ri joko widodo sebelumnya menerima kunjungan kenegaraannya nibiru how the nonsense planet x armageddon and nasa fake news theories spread globally nibiru planet x the end of the world as we know it on september probably not credit getty mark molloy september am nibiru conspiracy theories about the end of the world have been circulating online for more than two decades with the latest dubious prophecy predicting the apocalypse september planet x or nibiru refers to a mythological planet in our solar system that will supposedly crash into earth and wipe out the human race however it has been consistently dismissed by nasa and other experts as an internet hoax despite absolutely no scientific evidence to back up the suggestions of a rogue planet getting rapidly closer to earth myths about planet x continue to be perpetuated online of course this isnt the first time time harbingers of doom have predicted the end of time nasa also had to deny the existence of nibiru in throughout history there have been similar claims but thankfully none of them so far have been proved correct how did conspiracy theories about planet x start online chatter about nibiru began back in when wisconsin native nancy lieder created the alienconspiracy website zetatalk ms lieder claims to be a conduit for aliens from the zeta reticuli star system light years from earth who have warned her about the nibiru catastrophe the conspiracy theory hasnt gone away with socalled christian numerologist david meade claiming planet x is heading in our direction meade believes october could see the start the rapture and a sevenyear tribulation period of widescale natural disasters why september it has been claimed an unusual celestial arrangement mirroring signs from the bibles book of revelation september will signal the start of the end of the world however the earthsky blog notes there will be nothing unique about the sun moon and planets on the date in the past years this same event has happened at least four times already in and explains astronomer christopher m graney havent we been here before earth mars with earth visible in background credit getty this isnt the first time the apocalypse has been predicted american baptist teacher william miller first shared publicly his belief in the coming second advent of jesus christ in predicting he would return in the year the millerites were his followers and millerism became a national movement however when jesus didnt arrive october became known as the great disappointment twenty years ago members of heavens gate a ufo religious millenarian group committed suicide with the aim of boarding a ufo they believed was hiding behind the halebopp comet before the supposed end of the world planet x was also supposedly discovered by the ancient sumerian people and was meant to hit earth in but never arrived this catastrophe was initially predicted for may but when nothing happened the doomsday date was moved forward to december and linked to the end of one of the cycles in the ancient mayan calendar at the winter solstice in say nasa the end of the world was also supposed to arrive on may with christian doomsday prophet harold camping predicting the rapture would begin at in each of the worlds time zones wiping out naysayers with rolling earthquakes as believers ascended to heaven nasa had to debunk an ancient maya prophecy theory about the world ending back in the mayan connection was a misconception from the very beginning astrophysicist dr john carlson said at the time the maya calendar did not end on dec and there were no maya prophecies foretelling the end of the world on that date chris mccann leader and founder of the ebible fellowship said the world would be engulfed and destroyed by a great fire on october mccann said he was surprised by the outcome and wrote a blog post entitled a response to being incorrect with the prediction that in all likelihood the world would end on october what does nasa say this time nasa nasa is confident the world wont end credit afp nasa has definitively dismissed wild theories about nibiru as pseudoscience issuing a number of statements denying its existence various people are predicting that world will end on september when another planet collides with earth say nasa the planet in question nibiru doesnt exist so there will be no collision the story of nibiru has been around for years as has the days of darkness tale and is periodically recycled into new apocalyptic fables they add nibiru and other stories about wayward planets are an internet hoax there is no factual basis for these claims if nibiru or planet x were real and headed for an encounter with the earth astronomers would have been tracking it for at least the past decade and it would be visible by now to the naked eye obviously it does not exist eris is real but it is a dwarf planet similar to pluto that will remain in the outer solar system the closest it can come to earth is about billion miles nasa fake news and the days of darkness tale a fake news story being widely shared online suggests nasa has confirmed earth will experience days of complete darkness in november another fake news video claims that nasa has found nibiru and confirmed it is heading straight for us debunking website snopes explains the days of darkness tale is a bit of fake news lifted from an older viral rumour they say that it had already been around the online block several times before adding it has long since become an evergreen online hoax a jape that is typically resurrected a few times a year by dubious websites that simply update the time span for the alleged period of darkness and send it winging around the internet again what do other experts say nick pope who used to investigate ufos and other mysteries for the ministry of defence says nibiru doesnt exist he adds the world wont end on september shame on the people promoting this hoax in the name of evangelical christianity mr pope told the telegraph im certain nibiru doesnt exist because if there really was a rogue planet heading for earth due to hit on saturday it would be visible to the naked eye by now furthermore astronomers would have been aware of its presence for years both through direct observation and through gravitational effects on other planets in the solar system why are some people so keen to promote this conspiracy the people promoting this prediction seem to be doing so because of religious belief tenuously linking the recent eclipse with biblical passages including one from the book of revelations pope says i suspect the reasons include selfpublicity and the desire to promote their particular brand of evangelical christianity is there anything we should be worried about all this isnt to say that there arent some existential threats out there but if people want to worry about something they should probably worry about north korean missiles or about iran acquiring nuclear weapons not about nibiru pope adds there have been countless previous predictions of the end of the world selfevidently all these predictions were false september will pass without incident just as we safely negotiated all the previous dates that had been put forward as doomsday sumber source httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

aplikasi idoser narkoba digital sumber media sosial narasi mau share sedikit dr hasil seminar kemarin hf dursaw darurat narkoba sekarang tipe baru digital narcotic yg sgt mudah akses dr smart phone namanya aplikasinya idoser ortu perlu tahu mengenai doakan spy anak terhindar dr pengaruh buruk penjelasan idoser merupakan sebuah aplikasi suara masuk kuping mengecoh kinerja otak disebut narkoba digital kerap membuat pendengarnya kecanduan hilang akal layaknya mabuk bentuknya sama sekali obat serbuk gelombang suara format mp aplikasi idoser didownload smartphone berbasis android ataupun ios memilih dosis tepat gelombang suara masuk kuping mempengaruhi kinerja otak penggunanya kerap kecanduan mendengarkan alunan suara mengalun inilah membuat kecanduan aplikasi narkoba digital sejatinya bukanlah baru muncul idoser membuat heboh sekolah amerika beberapa belahan dunia sejak lalu sebuah pemberitaan newscom beberapa siswa sekolah mustang high school oklahoma kedapatan teler mendengarkan idoser bahkan kepolisian setempat sempat menganggap hoax meski tetap melakukan investigasi hebohnya idoser berimbas hingga indonesia membuat masyarakat menjadi cemas terlebih orang tua mempunyai anak disebut idoser termasuk golongan narkoba meskipun gelombang suara dihasilkan idoser diklaim memberikan sensasi memakai narkoba pendengarnya idoser termasuk golongan narkotika kata kepala bagian humas bnn kombes slamet pribadi jakarta rabu oktober undangundang no narkotika disebut narkotika zat obat berasal tanaman bukan tanaman baik sintetis maupun semisintetis menyebabkan penurunan perubahan kesadaran hilangnya rasa mengurangi menghilangkan rasa nyeri menimbulkan ketergantungan slamet mengatakan banyak kalangan mengklaim merasakan sensasi menggunakan narkoba mendengarkan konten binaural suara melalui aplikasi idoser beredar internet idoser disebutsebut narkoba bentuk digital pemberitaan beredar media sosial banyak remaja merasakan sensasi memakai narkoba mendengarkan konten berupa sebutan Ã¢april mopÃ¢ april mop sendiri merupakan hari orangorang diperbolehkan menipu berbohong orang rupanya suatu kebiasaan kaum jahiliah patut waspadai bersama seorang muslim tahukah apa arti Ã¢april mopÃ¢ sebenarnya sebenarnya april mop jatuh tanggal april sebuah perayaan hari kemenangan atas dibunuhnya ribuan umat islam spanyol tentara salib dilakukan melalui caracara penipuan sebabnya merayakan april mop cara melegalkan penipuan kebohongan dibungkus dalih sekedar hiburan keisengan belaka tak sedikit orang menganggap april mop jatuh tanggal april hari diperbolehkan sahsah menipu teman orangtua saudara sebagainya catatan sang target marah sadar dirinya menjadi sasaran april mop penjelasan aprils fool was never a christian festival whether in spain or anywhere else i dare say no muslim has ever found any other person celebrating this event we have to ask who exactly is celebrating this bloody and shameful episode obviously one cannot celebrate what one doesnt know reasons for feasts might possibly change over time but each feast is celebrated by the participants for their own reasons that they are aware of and it can hardly be a celebration of something they are unaware of httpansweringislamorghoaxesaprilfoolhtml the absolute verdict the above discussion makes it clear that the april fools day is not a tradition made to spite the muslims reacting to these rumours over the internet abdulhalim v has rightly remarked on planet granada blogsometimes i get the feeling that as a group muslims need to develop a lot more criticalthinking and need to learn not to pass on everything we hear from soandso as the truth httpwwwhasaancomaprilfoolsdayremovingmuslim asalnya sendiri blm jelas how the custom of pranking on april came about remains shrouded in mystery when the western world employed the julian calendar years began on march festivals marking the start of the new year were celebrated on the first day of april becausemarch fell during holy week the adoption of the gregorian calendar during the s moved the new year to january according to the most widelybelieved origin postulated for april fools day those who could be tricked into believing april was still the proper day to celebrate the new year earned the sobriquet of april fools to this end french peasants would unexpectedly drop in on neighbors on that day in a effort to confuse them into thinking they were receiving a new years call out of that one jape supposedly grew the tradition of testing the patience of family and friends but thats only one theory others are the timing of this day of pranks seems to be related to the arrival of spring when nature fools mankind with fickle weather according to the encyclopedia of religion and the encyclopedia britannica the country diary of garden lore which chronicles the goingson in an english garden says that april fools day is thought to commemorate the fruitless mission of the rook the european crow who was sent out in search of land from noahs floodencircled ark others theorize it may have something to do with the vernal equinox some think to tie in with the romans endofwinter celebration hilaria and the end of the celtic new year festival httpwwwsnopescomholidaysaprilfoolsoriginsasp httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

fenomena equinox bikin suhu jadi derajat celcius indonesia sumber whatsapp narasi teman yb sekedar menginformasikan fenomena equinox mempengaruhi malaysia singapura indonesia hr depan disarankan utk tinggal rumah diruang kerja terutama jam hari suhu berfluktuasi derajat celcius mudah menyebabkan dehidrasi matahari stroke fenomena matahari diposisikan tepat atas garis khatulistiwa pd tgl maret harap menjaga kesehatan diri tdk dehidrasi orang mengkonsumsi liter cairan hari memonitor tekanan darah kemungkinan mendapatkan serangan panas mandi air dingin sesering mungkin mengurangi daging perbanyak buahan sayuran tempatkan lilin terpakai luar rumah lilin meleleh berarti udara tingkat cukup berbahaya selalu menempatkan ember dgn air setengah penuh ruangan ruang tamu kamar menjaga suhu tetap lembab pengalaman pertama malaysia singapura heat stroke memiliki gejala indikasi pingsan serius berbahaya kegagalan organ hari menjadi lebih hangat mungkin lebih minggu depan derajat lebih tinggi biasanya terima kasih penjelasan sebuah pesan siaran tersebar menyebutkan fenomena equinox melanda singapura malaysia indonesia selama hari depan fenomena disebut meningkatkan suhu cukup signifikan derajat celcius pesan siaran menyarankan masyarakat berdiam rumah pukul wib tanggal maret disebutkan equinox menyebabkan dehidrasi heat stroke tautan berita dicantumkan pesan tersebut equinox fenomena mana matahari berada khatulistiwa matahari benarbenar berada atas kepala siang hari tanggal maret martahari melintasi equator selatan utara belahan bumi selatan utara samasama mendapat sinar matahari ujar kepala lapan prof thomas djamaludin berbincang detikcom thomas menambahkan fenomena equinox memang terjadi sebanyak kali setahun equinox berikutnya terjadi september kemudian menyebut informasi disebarkan mengenai dampak equinox terlalu berlebihan kata thomas tak perubahan suhu signifikan equinox perlu khawatir matahari melintas biasa tak perubahan justru equinox lama siang sama malam imbuh thomas suhu udara ratarata derajat celcius equinox tak berbeda jauh suhu tersebut fenomena equinox memang terjadi bulan maret september tahun dampak ditimbulkan equinox separah dijelaskan pesan siaran temperatur udara berubah signifikan equinox pesan siaran dampak equinox tersebut benar hoax referensi caltex is infuriated that its promotion at service stations has become a victim of urban myth police spokesperson superintendent vincent mdunge said such claims were untrue and police are now investigating where these emails originated from it is purely a hoax and motorists need not have any fears such assumptions are really ludicrous we will definitely open criminal charges against these hoaxsters once they are caught caltex reassured customers that key rings being handed out at petrol stations do not have tracking devices on them and that this was part of a brand awareness campaign to promote caltexs power diesel brand said spokesperson miranda anthony we have been running a caltex power diesel promotion through our service station network caltex branded key rings were issued to our diesel customers as part of this promotion these are novelty items and have a flashing device meant to create product awareness link fafhh httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

aren gula merah sepertinya udah cukup buanyak denger berita ttg penyakit cancer lach ternyata pemicu utamanya makanan sy belakangan baru tahu kalau gula aren alias gula jawa berwarna coklat kayak batu mengandung formalin informasi sseorg dipercaya usahanya jualan jamu membuat minuman juice botol pengawet sedikitpun menariknya racikan minumannya pake gula yg namanya gulajawa yg mana ternyata diselidiki mengandung formalin kemudian berusaha mencari mengandung formalinternyata alias hampir semua mengandung formalin akhirnya langsung petaninya pikir free formalin ternyata diberi formalin atas instruksi tengkulak kalau dilakukan mau beli jadi formalin diteteskan dituangkan diatas pohon memang efek formalin membuat gulajawa jadi lebih awet keras lembek proses memasaknya lebih cepet kemudian bilang stop pake formalin ntar sy yg beli gulanya beli gulanya jk tengkulak menolak beli lucunya lgpara petani gk berani makan gulajawa buatan sendirinya loch tahu mengandung racun telen terusracun itubodoh nach sebenarnya gulajawa diaplikasikan yaa ohternyata banyak tahu misalnya kolak hampir semua kolak pake gulajawa jadi biasa buka puasa pake kolak yaa selametlah meminum formalin kuekue pake gulajawa roti gambang gadogado ketoprak rujak brown sugar mengetahui mana gulajawa pakai pengawet formalin dipakai tips berikut ternyata gulajawa sehat dirubung lalat dn semut halnya daun sehat ddt daun ulatnya hik hik hik ternyata binatang lbh cerdik drpd dlm mendeteksi racunformalin pilih gulaarenjawa lembek mudah meleleh pakai formalin membuatnya menjadi keras gula arenjawa pakai pengawet harum yg pastiyg pakai pengawetgulajawa baik kemasannya mudah rusak nach selamat mencari gulajawa asli formalin yach ternyata banyak sekali orang memasukkan racun makanan sengaja sekedar kondisi seorang pemuda sunni bernama husain khudri menghadapi eksekusi mati iran digantung syiah negeri tampak rasa takut sedikitpun wajahnya tersenyum penuh suka cita seakanakan melakukan resepsi pernikahan padahal dihadapi eksekusi hukum gantung dieksekusi menyapa keluarganya cara melambaikan tangannya tersenyum riang husain merupakan aktivis prosunni aktif menyebarkan dakwah sunni berasal suku kurdi iran anggota partai kebebasan kurdistan tentara iran dituduh pembunuh dieksekusi pemerintah iran atas tuduhan tersebut eksekusi dilaksanakan tanggal januari kirakira satu tahun silam ikan plastik afrika shop hoax makanan berbahan plastik laku dijual kubis beras plastik kini malah muncul ikan plastik informasi palsu makin dipercaya dilengkapi video salah satu penyebar hoax iklan plastik akun youtube pelpatime agustus video ditampilkan potonganpotongan tubuh ikan sedang dibersihkan narasi ikan sedang dibersihkan ternyata plastik baru dibeli sebuah afrika shop london cukup lama si pengisi suara mengatakan ikan berbahan plastik mencontohkan sisi ikan molor daging ikan lentur sebuah spons ditekan keluar air spons ujar si narator video kini cepat menyebar indonesia salah satu penyebarnya ialah akun fans page facebook generasi now kacau ikan plastik like share biar semua orang waspada tulis akun tersebut jawa pos menelusuri kabar melalui aquaculture and fisheries improvement manager wwf habib abdullah habib mengatakan sulit mempercayai video tersebut sebuah kebenaran yakin ikan plastik ujarnya ikan apa kena air lalu dimasukan freezer dikeluarkan ditekan keras utuh pernah lihat model daging ikan indonesia mungkin jenis ikan luar negeri ujarnya habib pernah mendapatkan cerita temannya luar negeri memang ikan dagingnya mirip spons berdasar pencarian google mengenai freezer burn ternyata terdapat bahasan soal ikan plastik tersebut sebuah situs pembasmi hoax hoaxorfactcom pernah membahas video serupa beberapa hari lalu menyebut narasi mungkin mengalami editing situs menyebut ikan video tersebut mungkin mengalami freezer burn dilihat terdapatnya tanda bintikbintik kasar cokelat keabuabuan tanda khas ikan beku dikutip majalah infisherman edisi online freezer burn terjadi proses pembekuan ikan maupun daging apa dibekukan terlalu lama cara salah mengalami freezer burn kandungan air daging ikan berubah menjadi kristal es akhirnya daging menjadi kering dimasukkan air jangka waktu cukup lama daging ikan kering menyerap air busa ikan freezer burn terlihat tandanya daging keputihan mengeras kualitas daging ikan mengalami freezer burn memang menurun beberapa tulisan aman dikonsumsi kesimpulan berdasarkan informasi diatas mengenai ikan plastik dikategorikan hoax narasi diubah ikan ditunjukkan mengalami freezer burn terlalu lama dibekukan indonesia dibodohkan air mineral sumber media sosial narasi tahun melakukan penelitian akhirnya harvard university menambah temuan betapa bahayanya air mineral mengandung flourida terdapat air mineral aqua kepunyaan danone aqua kini sahamnya dibeli danone mengandung zat flourida termuan terkini harvard university air mineral fluorida mengurangi iq anakanak sebuah pertanyaan besar danone melalui aqua menanamkan zat berbahaya minuman anakanak indonesia target apa puluhan tahun mendatang temuan membuktikan air fluorida berbagai negara mengonsumsinya termasuk indonesia ditemukan fakta anakanak tinggal daerah air mengandung konsentrasi tinggi fluorida meminum air mineral kandungan flourida indinesia salah satunya koefisien intelektualnya sangat rendah melihat sebuah unsur kesengajaan kemudian pihak danone menggunakan zidane idola kampanye air mineral indonesia disebabkan zidane muslim penduduk indonesia mayoritas muslim ilmuwan universitas harvard melakukan studi besar mengumpulkan hasil penelitian sebelumnya periode tahun mana mempelajari efek air fluorida anakanak hasilnya menunjukkan fluorida mempengaruhi perkembangan otak anakanak tingkat lebih besar mempengaruhi orang dewasa laporan tersebut fluorida menyebabkan kerusakan hippocampus mengurangi kadar lipid plakat pembentukan betaamiloid kelainan terjadi penyakit alzheimer eksaserbasi cedera kerusakan sistem pertahanan antioksidan peningkatan aluminium akumulasi fluoride kelenjar pineal kesemuanya didalam otak manusia studi menemukan fluorida berlebih didalam tubuh menyebabkan gejalagejala berikut hiperaktif kelesuan gangguan otot radang sendi demensia aktifnya enzim menghambat lebih enzim menghambat pembentukan antibodi kematian sel patah tulang beberapa jenis kanker tulang besarnya kampanye minum mineral berflourida sungguh sebuah pertanyaan besar apa direncanakan zionisme jangka panjang menciptakan orangorang anggota zionis menjadi bodoh dikuasai penjelasan kabar air mineral mengandung flourida tersebar masyarakat membuat warga resah air mineral kemasan aqua merupakan produksi perusahaan danone diduga mengandung flourida mengganggu kesehatan bahkan isu dikaitkan zionis pernyataan isi artikel disebar klinikpengobatanalamiwordpresscom tanggal september perusahaan danone memiliki hubungan erat israel penjelasannya aqua produk danone merupakan salah satu perusahaan paling setia israel anugerahi jubile award jubilee award penghargaan tertinggi diberikan zionis israel kelompok perorangan pengusaha perusahaan kurun waktu lama membantu mendonasikan profit usahanya zionis israel tahun faktanya air mineral kemasan bermerk tersebut berbahaya kesehatan aqua memang mengandung fluoride kandungannya bawah mgl memang sni air minum kemasan mengandung fluoride melebihi mgl angka jauh lebih rendah yg ditetapkan who mgl jadi dikatakan aman dikutip httpindonesianhoaxesblogspotcoid memang fluoride dibutuhkan menjaga kesehatan gigi mulut kemudian menjadi masalah berita beredar membawa agama tertentu berikut membandingkan kandungan fluoride suatu air dianggap suci suatu agama kebetulan berita banyak disebarkan membawa embelembel konspirasi yahudi berhubungan erat konflik provokasi air zamzam hoax isu provokasi berbuat banyak menganalisa tunggu pernyataan resmi dimuat website resmi danone indonesia diposting sepember wib berikut kutipannya tanggapan perusahaan terkait isu kandungan fluorida aqua sehubungan beredarnya informasi media sosial mengenai kandungan fluorida aqua perusahaan menyampaikan tanggapan berikut aqua merupakan air mineral sumber air berasal pegunungan vulkanik perjalanannya air hujan jatuh pegunungan terserap lapisan tanah mengalami mineralisasi alami air diperkaya mineral dikandung batuan dilewatinya salah satu jenis mineral alami tersebut fluorida fluorida salah satu zat gizi mikro dibutuhkan tubuh dikonsumsi jumlah cukup bermanfaat mencegah karies gigi berperan penting pembentukan email gigi anakanak pemerintahtelah menetapkan batasan kandungan fluorida air minum melalui peraturan menteri kesehatan republik indonesia no menkesperiv persyaratan kualitas air minum lebih mgl batasan sama ditetapkan world health organization who sebesar mgl batasan lebih ketat bahkan ditetapkan sni air minum kemasan kandungan fluoride air mineral melebihi mgl berdasarkan pemantauan dilakukan berkala kandungan fluorida produk aqua lebih mgl jauh bawah batas ditetapkan kementerian kesehatan who produk mendapatkan sertifikat sni produk aqua dipantau lembaga sertifikasi produk aqua jutaan burung kerumuni pantai dubai sumber media sosial narasi bismillah jutaan burung tibatiba berkumpul memenuhi pantai dubai uni emirate arab bbrapa hari hewanhewan biasanya keluar habitatnya keadaan bahaya semisal harimau monyet kijang penghuni hutan keluar gunung sesaat gunung meletus burung laut barangkali pertanda tsunami dahsyat melumat keserakahan dubai ataukah pangkalan militer tentara langit ikut melumat habis tentaratentara syaitan israel syam palestina bergunalah seluruh strategi teknologi menghadapi milyaran burung langit allahuakbar bersiaplah kaum muslimin hutan ghorqod rumahrumah kota gudang peluru pertahanan israel sedang allah bakar seminggu nonstop halhal besar sedang terjadi dibumi allah penjelasan the al murjan island beach in the emirate of ras al khaimah police was in the spotlight on social media over the last few days after hundreds of thousands of migrating birds were seen there dr saif al ghais director of the authority rak said the seabirds locally known as al lawa birds were mistakenly described as millions of crows either dead or gathering on the rak beaches the lawa birds were just migrating in big numbers up to hundreds of thousands at a time to the uae in search for warm weather as they always do on the same time every year the lawa birds scientifically known as cormorant birds are always seen on the uae warm beaches in winter as part of their annual migration from the freezing european continent the marine biology professor added phalacrocoracidae is a family of about species of aquatic birds commonly known as cormorants and shags however several different classifications of the family have been proposed recently indicating he said migrating birds create their own colonies on the al siniya island in the emirate of umm al quwain for breeding they build up numerous nests for hatching their young these mediumtolarge seabirds known for their super skills of deep diving in search for food and fish weigh around kg each and have a wing span of cm dr ghais elaborated the young lawa birds familiar to emirati fishermen and nukhaza or captains with their long thin and hooked bills are born with pure white feathers but these turn into black when they grow older and bigger their feet have webbing between all four toes he explained all species are fisheaters catching the prey by diving from the surface they are excellent divers and underwater they propel themselves with their feet with help from their wings some cormorant species have been found to dive as deep as m he pointed out they have relatively short wings due to their need for economical movement underwater and consequently have the highest flight costs of any bird cormorants nest in colonies around the shore on trees islets or cliffs they are coastal rather than oceanic birds and some have colonised inland waters dr ghais stated indeed the original ancestor of cormorants seems to have been a freshwater bird they range around the world except for the central pacific islands dr ghais said these birds have no problem building their nests individually or close to other species both male and female birds help each other build these nests where each female lay three to four eggs at a time the couple also shares the to day period of incubation he said though the chicks can flay at the age of days they only become adult at the age of three to five years old httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

natuna cina kerahkan armada tempur besarbesaran nbcindonesiablogspotcom natuna dicaplok china bukti pulau terluar indonesia rawan okezonecom aneh skali liat beberapa org yg loncat kegirangan baca berita kok seneng sih kalau wilayah negara sendiri d caplok luar salah yg lupa baca artikel salah media yg lupa mencantumkan kata laut judul berita salah salah temen lalu bagaimana berita armada laut china d laut china selatan objective sedikit ga sih natuna kekayaan alam baik darat maupun laut memang menggiurkan bukan alasan buat gr benar china mengerahkan armada besar menguasai laut china selatan bukan khusus natuna lebih menguasai seluruh laut china selatan yg claim khususnya spratly island paracel island were not alone in this matter masalah passport yg banyak orang d artikan natuna dicaplok china padahal bila lihat dr sudut pandang objective bukan natuna yg d caplok sbagian utara wilayah laut natuna yg masuk zona ekonomi exclusive versi unclos zee inilah yg menjadi konflik bukan pulaunya a new map on chinese passports encompasses part_of_the_natuna_waters raising the irk of indonesian officials thediplomatcom sepertinya membaca berita banyak org sumbu pendek mendadak kebelet bisanya bilang pemerintahan jokowi diam natuna d caplok cina heellaaaaw ngapain aja ryamizard ryacudu bawa armada k natuna nyari ikan bantuin susi kaya nelayan d natuna kurang banyak aja tambahan sedikit tambahan mengenai perbedaan territorial water exclusive economic zone the difference between the territorial sea and the exclusive economic zone is that the first confers full sovereignty over the waters whereas the second is merely a sovereign_right which refers to the coastal states rights below the surface of the sea the surface waters as can be seen in the map are international waters perbedaan territorial water zee wikipedia territorial water the term territorial_waters is also sometimes used informally to describe any area of water over which a state has jurisdiction including internal waters the contiguous zone the exclusive economic zone and potentially the continental shelf territorial water wikipedia territorial water daerah mana jurisdiksi sepernuhnya berlaku kata wna yg berada territorial water tampa ijin entah naik kapal berenang tanggkap terkena hukum jurisdiksi indonesia territorial water terbentang palingjauh km mil laut yg dalamnya mencakup mil laut mil laut zee jadi sependapat kabupaten natuna berhenti mil laut garis pantai natuna bukan berarti santai membiarkan china mencaplok wilaya zona ekonomi eksklusif sy rasa lebih tepat kalau beritakan apa adanya kertas happy lsd beredar anakanak sumber media sosial narasi warning drugs model baru lsd kenal dgn nama kertas happy model bentuknya menarik rasa manis permenefek halusinasi tinggi jual rprb kalau ketagihan harga rpjtgram share menyelamatkan generasi penerus dr drugs target anak sekolah penjealsan fakta beredar pesan berantai broadcast media sosial narkotika jenis baru bentuknya kertas warnawarni gambarnya luculucu menarik berbentuk segi empat ukurannya sangat kecil lebih cm kertas kecil bagian kecil sebuah kertas berukuran hvs bila dipisahkan mungkin jumlahnya puluhan sekilas terlihat stiker biasa dimainkan anakanak anehnya stiker ditempelkan lidah bukan anggota tubuh lainnya umumnya tangan kaki lysergic acid diethylamide lsd narkoba terlalu populer indonesia nama lsd mencuat kasus kecelakaan terjadi pondok indah menewaskan empat orang tersangka christoper daniel sjarif berbagai literatur lsd biasanya mulai bereaksi waktu satu jam bertahan hingga jam beberapa perubahan fisik tubuh selama mengkonsumsi obat pupil melebar peningkatan tekanan darah suhu tubuh tinggi efek utama lsd visual warnawarna tampak lebih kuat cahaya lampu tampak lebih cerah objek stabil tampak bergerakbergerak memiliki lingkaran cahaya dikutip detikcom kepala humas bnn kombes slamet pribadi dihubungi detikcom menjelaskan lsd memang berbeda narkotika jenis lainnya berbagai macam warna gambar menjadi daya tarik tersendiri modelnya banyak dulu diterima naga terbang pinokio miki mouse potongan kertas berukuran cm jelas kombes slamet ditanya peredarannya hingga sekolahsekolah indonesia slamet memastikan kasus terungkap selama terjadi luar lingkungan sekolah kalau pribadi mendapati kasus hasil tangkapan bukan sekolahsekolah bandara lalu fredy budiman pernah melapor kandungannya bukan lsd efeknya menyerupai paparnya slamet tahu persis lsd biasa disebut kertas happy penjual konsumennya soal rasa harga slamet membantah lsd memiliki rasa manis harganya murah manis harga sendiri tahu sepengetahuan termasuk eksklusif bantahnya slamet menyimpulkan narkoba lsd memang mirip beredar pesan slamet mengkonfirmasi kesimpulan lsd memang broadcast beredar terkonfirmasi nerima laporan jadikan laetrile alias amygdalin vitamin b satusatunya obat diperlukan sembuhkan kanker sumber media sosial media daring httpssimomotcomterbongkarkankerbukanlahpenyakittetapibisnis narasi kanker bukan penyakit bisnis miliaran dolar artikel news resque sempat menjadi viral media sosial judulnya memang menghentak mengejutkan publik sana tertulis a secret has been uncovered cancer is not a disease but business kata pembukaan artikel langsung ditulis kata menohok the word called cancer is a lie kata disebut kanker sebuah kebohongan baiklah selanjutnya berikut disajikan terjemahan artikel tersebut ditulis news rescue mungkin percaya kanker bukanlah penyakit bisnis istilah kanker menyebar luas mempengaruhi tua muda bayi semua orang membagikan artikel bagus mengekspos banyak pihak selama tersembunyi memanipulasi fakta mengenai kanker artikel bakal mengganggu kenyamanan tahu buku dunia kanker world without cancer hingga sekarang dicegah tangantangan tersembunyi upaya penerjemahan banyak bahasa dunia ketahulah penyakit disebut kanker kanker timbul terjadinya kekurangan vitamin b penyebab lainnya hindarilah kemoterapi operasi mengonsumsi obatobatan kenyataannya memiliki efek samping besar ingat masa lalu banyak pelaut kehilangan nyawa penyakit kudis penyakit merenggut banyak orang sejumlah pihak mendapat keuntungan besar situasi belakangan ditemukan diketahui penyakit kudis hanyalah akibat kekurangan vitamin c artinya kudis bukanlah penyakit kanker penjajah musuh kemanusiaan mendirikan industri kanker membuatnya menjadi ladang bisnis usaha mendapatkan penghasilan jumlah sangat besar industri kanker berkembang perang dunia ii melawan kanker semua penderita langsung diarahkan berobat pemilik industri kanker senyatanya pencegahan penyembuhan kanker diperoleh cara berikut menderita kanker pertamatama memahami apa kanker jangan panik menyelidiki mendalami kondisi alami berkaca kasus jaman dulu orang mati garagara penyakit disebut kudis kan iya penyakit sembuh ketahulah kanker hanyalah kekurangan vitamin b makan biji buah aprikot hari cukup makanlah kecambah gandum kecambah gandum obat antikanker ajaib kecambah gandum merupakan sumber makanan kaya oksigen cair mengandung materi antikanker sangat kuat bernama laetrile laetrile biji buah apel merupakan bentuk ekstraksi vitamin b amygdalin industri obat amerika membuat aturan hukum melarang produksi laetrile obat kemudian diproduksi meksiko tujuan diselundupkan amerika serikat dr harold w manner buku death of cancer menyatakan keberhasilan pengobatan kanker laetrile mencapai tingkat kesuksesan atas sumber amygdalin vitamin b makanan mengandung vitamin b inti biji buahbuahan biji buahbuahan merupakan sumber vitamin b tertinggi alam termasuk dalamnya biji buah apel aprikot peach pir prune plum kering kacangkacangan jagung bijibijian dalamnya meliputi kacang lentil kecambah lentil bud kacang lima kacang tanah kernels bitter almond sumber terkaya vitamin b alam almond india mulberries hampir semua mulberry murbei hitam blueberry raspberry strawberry bijibijian wijen biji rami benih linen biji rami menir gandum barley beras merah menir blok gandum biji rami millet gandum hitam vitamin b ditemukan bijibijian biji buah aprikot ragi beras kasar beras sawah manisan labu berikut daftar buahbuahan antikanker aprikot kernel biji biji buahbuahan lainnya apel ceri persik plum plum pir kacang lima kacang fava wheatgrass kacang almond raspberi elderberry stroberi blackberry bluberi soba sorghum jelai jewawut kacang mete kacang macadamia tauge semuanya sumber tertinggi vitamin b diserap menelan sengaja cairan pencuci piring digunakan dapur pencuci tangan cair digunakan kamar kecil menjadi faktor penyebab kanker utama batasi penggunaannya mengatakan mungkin makan cairan pencuci fajtanya banyak seharihari mencuci tangan sabun tangan cair mencuci piring cairan pencuci piring cairan terserap pernah hilang meski mencuci piring memasak makan makanan sabun piring hidangan melekat makanan dipanaskan akhirnya tercampurlah cairan pencuci piring makanan bahkan bilas ratusan kali piring usaha tersebut gunanya solusinya bagaimana tuangkan setengah bagian cairan pencuci piring pencuci tangan setengah bagian cuka solusi sederhana jelas mencegah salah satu penyebab timbulnya kanker menyelamatkan keluarga bahaya kanker berhentilah mencuci sayuran cairan pencuci piring meski setetes seberapa banyak membilasnya bahan kimia memasuki jaringan sayuran dibilas sebaliknya rendam buahbuahan sayuran garam kemudian bilas air bersih tetap segar tambahkan cuka silakan berbagi megawati bikin jokowi nyaman usai penyebutan petugas partai sumber media daring httpwwwgeloracomegawatibikinjokowitidaknyamanh narasi ketua umum pdi perjuangan megawati soekarnoputri lagilagi mengingatkan posisi presiden jokowi petugas partai mantan mendagri letjen tni purn syarwan hamid justru mengkritik pernyataan mega akhirakhir mencerminkan perilaku arogan takabur naif apa disampaikan megawati melengkapi ungkapan pelecehan disampaikan kongres pdip lalu kata syarwan redaksi senin syarwan mengatakan bukan umat islam jokowi sendiri ikut nyaman pernyataan mega belakangan kalangan pengamat politik bahkan menyebut megawati tengah panik sependapat penilaian masa suram partai memang sedang berproses tukas menteri era orde baru penjelasan memasuki tahun serangan serangan politik minuman red bull mengandung sperma banteng sumber media sosial narasi red bull and other brands of energy drinks contain bull semen penjelasan energy drinks such as red bull have long been dogged by rumors that they contain dangerous ingredients such as artificially manufactured stimulants and in more recent years such rumors have taken a turn towards the bizarre with claims that various brands of energy drink include bull semen or bull sperm more outlandish versions of such rumors maintain that some entity such as the longhorn cattle company performed tests on energy drinks and found in fact they do contain bull sperm why a livestock company would want to test commercial beverages for the presence of bull sperm remains unexplained the bull sperm rumor seems to stem from the fact that the red bull brand of energy drink includes taurine an organic acid which among other uses is often added to infant milk formulas because taurine is naturally present in breast milk the composition of that substances name taur being a greeklatin root for bull and the ine suffix denoting something derived from the preceding root suggests to the casual observer that taurine is something made or excreted by a bull possibly something like bull urine and of course the brand name red bull ties the product to the image of a bull and connotations of the strong powerful potent life force that animal represents so it doesnt seem like such a stretch that the drink might contain some type of vital essence taken from the animal itself although taurine is so named because it was first isolated from ox bile it is actually found in the large intestines and tissues of many different animals including humans but the taurine used in red bull brand energy drink and other foods is not derived from bulls or any other animal at all its synthetically produced in laboratories since at least red bulls online faq has addressed questions about the taurine used in their popular energy drink being made from bulls testicles or derived from bull semen q is taurine made from bulls testicles is taurine a derivative of bulls testicles or semen a the taurine in red bull energy drink is a purely synthetic substance produced by pharmaceutical companies and is not derived from animals or animal materials all ingredients for red bull energy drink are synthetically produced by pharmaceutical companies this guarantees the highest quality q is taurine made from bulls testicles a many people bet it comes from some delicate parts of the strongest and most potent bulls in the world but the fact is that the taurine in red bull is produced synthetically to the highest quality standards link fafhh httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

beberapa media online tanah air terkait hasil penelitian menerangkan basuki tjahaja purnama ahok merupakan gubernur dki jakarta memiliki tujuh faktor negatif menyeret nama profesor kini dipercaya dunia luar kepala riset otak university california pemberitaan tersebut menyebutkan prof dr taruna ikrar kepala riset otak university of california melalui tulisan ditulis seorang bernama sem haisy menyebutkan hasil penelitian prof dr taruna ikrar menyatakan tujuh faktor negatif melekat sikap retorika ahok memimpin jakarta pemberitaan dihimpun wartakesehatan beberapa media online profesor pernah dicalonkan penerima nobel menyatakan sudut pandang neurosains ahok termasuk pemimpin indonesia perlu diobservasi otaknya prof taruna menggunakan tiga metode mengukur tersebut performance emotions unstable less empathy wild decision terkait sejumlah situs online menyertakan namanya prof taruna menyatakan keterangan terkait ahok memiliki tujuh faktor negatif benar adanya berikut bantahan prof dr taruna ikrar kepala riset otak university of california melalui pesan elektronik diterima redaksi wartakesehatancom senin terkait sejumlah situs online menyertakan nama beritaartikelnya terkait sosok gubernur dki jakarta basuki tjahaja purnama pendukungnya mengalami masalah otak bersama menyampaikan klarifikasi pernah menyatakanmenulis tulisanberita tersebut menyampaikan informasi benar berpotensi menyesatkan opini publik mengandung fitnah rasisme and diskriminatif mencemarkan nama baik berharap masyarakat terpancing bijak menanggapi menyikapi informasi disampaikan lewat sumber berita online basa ternyata zatzat berkhasiat soda kue mampu membasmi selsel kanker banyak orang terpesona mendengar kisah sukses vernon menyembuhkan sakit kanker stadium tak perlu operasi kanker prostat tak perlu kemoterapi berefek macammacam termasuk merontokkan rambut ternyata rahasia suksesnya tersembunyi soda kue bahan membuat beragam kue hari mengkonsumsi ramuan soda kue buatannya memeriksakan diri dokter maple sulit didapat tanah air supermarket besar malmal kota besar akhirnya cerita seorang wanita indonesia mencoba resep vernon ganti sirup maple manis madu sirup maple madu berfungsi membantu natrium bikarbonat soda kue menembus selsel kanker soda kue mengandung natrium bikarbonat membantu meningkatkan ph kadar asambasa organorgan tubuh lebih bersifat basa alkalis asam meningatkan kadar oksigen karbon dioksida tubuh tubuh bersifat basa alkalis mematikan selsel kanker tumbuh subur tubuh bersifat asam tubuh bersifat basa alkalis membuat mudah terserang berbagai penyakit penjelasan vernon masukkan air cangkir lalu nyalakan kompor masukkan soda kue sendok teh lalu aduklah masukkan madu sendok teh lalu aduklah rata memasak ramuan singkat perlu lama matikan api tuang ramuan gelas biarkan dingin lalu minumlah minumlah x sehari lalu tingkatkan x sehari hari akhirnya x sehari hari selanjutnya waktu mencoba ramuan ciptaannya merasa sakit kepala keringat malam hari gejala tiap orang asam ph makanan apapun makan setinggi apapun kadar basa nya menjadi bersifat asam gunanya berusaha meningkatkan kadar basa tubuh mengkonsumsi makanan bersifat basa semuanya diubah menjadi bersifat asam lambung salah satu korban naima after about three months at youngs facility her condition worsened and she was taken to hospital naima was brought back to the uk and died with her family she was afzal amin told us they feel utterly betrayed its just horrific that somebody could exploit people for money this is i think for them the most disturbing element that for something as cheap as money he was just able to destroy peoples lives the main problem with this view is that it doesnt appear to take into account the stomach which functions at a ph of about and is the most acidic compartment in the body thus everything we consume regardless of its starting ph becomes acidic before passing into the intestines referensi httpwwwbbccomnewsmagazine httpswwwfacebookcomgroupsfafhhpermalink

surat presiden jokowi meminta dukungan bumn pemenangan pilpres sumber media sosial narasi office of the president of indonesia federal government administrative centre istana negarajalan merdeka utarajakarta pusat indonesia pt pembangunan perumahan persero tbk andi gani nena wea plaza pp wisma subiyanto jl letjend tb simatupang no pasar rebo jakarta indonesia sirmadam herewith i know this letter many come to you as a surprise but i wish to my exspress my heartleft thanks and appreciation towards your commitment hard work and role in helping to move our great and beloved country towards a greater height your leadership in your sector has not gone unnoticed hence you are receiving this better from me with the next general election ge cooming soon i would like to use this medium to reach out to your humble self and sobcit for your support and loyality with an amicable personality such as yourself am confident that we will archiefe great things working together however iwould like you to keep our communication from here on discreet and confidential i have so much faith is you and your capabilities and lock forward working with you i the nearest future as soon as you receive this letter i large you to send me an email to asknowledge the receignt of this letter my private e mail is jokowiirianagmailcom whatsapp no i look forward to hearing from you yours sincerely president irhjoko widodo the president of the republic of indonesia istana negarajalan medan merdeka utara jakarta pusat indonesia penjelasan pihak istana negara melalui staf khusus presiden bidang komunikasi johan budi sp menyatakan surat berbahasa inggris mengatasnamakan presiden joko widodo jokowi menggunakan kop kantor kepresidenan indonesia tujuannya meminta dukungan pemilu bumn penerima raden prabowo argo yuwono menjelaskan pelaku pembuat penyebaran surat tersebut berjumlah tiga orang merupakan wna guinea liberia satu indonesia pengakuan pelaku menyebarkan surat palsu puluhan bumn menggunakan jasa perusahaan pengiriman barang jadi pelaku mengirimkan surat perusahaan bumn jakarta melalui jne tuturnya rabu kombes argo menjelaskan lebih barang bukti disita kepolisian polisi surat terbuka andrea hirata ahok gubernur dki jakarta sumber media online narasi selamat pagi kawan berurai air mata menyampaikannya teman sendiri sangat baik termasuk mengagumi sepak terjang keberanian obsesi miliki membangun negeri temantemanya jakarta memang membutuhkan sosok kasar tegas pemberani jakarta menjadi kota metropolis pembajak negara surat andrea hirata ahok gubernur dki jakarta negara bangsaku tercinta aku terpaksa mengatakan kepadanya aku meminta kamu menjadi gubernur ibukota negaraku indonesia negaramu kamu sekarang berdiri sendiri belakangmu sekarang banyak pihak berkepentingan besar jangka panjang grand design belakangmu kau tolak kawan kamu tau paham grand design menakutkan bangsaku bangsamu katakan kau ingat bicara cikini akulah orang pertama menyumbang rekening perjuanganmu berpasangan jokowi memimpin jakarta bahkan aku mengajak temanteman lainnya ikut menyumbang kau sukses seiring sering bercanda melalui bbm bangga kepadamu kawan kawanku kini kau sendirian grand design belakangmu sangat menakutkan bangsaku kau mundur calon gubernur ibukota negaraku negaramu aku sangat bangga kepadamu kau tetap menjadi teman terbaikku pernah aku kenal sejak remaja pulau tercinta belitung tetapitetapitetapi kau tetap maju calon gubernur ibukota negaraku negaramu bangsa negaraku kau kuanggap musuhku aku menantang kamu kamu tak berdaya bangkit diperlukan perang berperang habishabisan melawan kamu kamu kalah tak berdaya aku memeluk kamu kawan aku meminta maaf aku menyelamatkan bangsa negaraku cengkraman sebuah grand design menakutkan bangsaku aku kawan sahabatmu samasama punya mimpi besar bangsa negara anak laskar pelangi pahamilah cinta kamu bangga melihat kamu sekarang semoga kamu mengerti sikap terima kasih andrea hirata fakta penjelasan beredarnya surat ditulis andrea hirata gubernur dki jakarta ahok dunia maya isi surat tersebut andrea hirata mengkritik kinerja ahok pemimpin jakarta menganggap ahok merubah jakarta menjadi kota taharrush budaya pemerkosaan massal kuno ala bangsa arab menyebar eropa sumber media daring dailymailcouk akun facebook budz kay httpswwwfacebookcombudzkayvideosfrefgsdtihc_locationgroup narasi metode pemerkosaan taharrush mulai diperkenalkan imigran arab eropa invasi imigran timur tengah besarbesaran eropa membawa sebuah tradisi arab bernama taharrush gamea yg cukup mengagetkan bangsa eropa pernah kenal sebelumnya taharrush merupakan sebuah tradisi permainan kuno bangsa arab seorang perempuan ditelanjangi diperkosa ramairamai ala gangbang perempuan yg diperkosa tersebut dikerumuni banyak pria yg membentuk formasi lingkaran orang menolong terhalang kerumunan metode formasi taharrush mustahil wanita yg diperkosa mustahil wanita yg diselamatkan pemerkosaan metode taharrush dikembangkan ribuan tahun efektifitasnya bangsa arab kuno kini metode klasik tersebut mulai dibangkitkan eropa imigran budaya arab kuno memperkosa wanita bukanlah suatu tindak kriminal tingkat tinggi bahkan pemerkosaan malah dijadikan suatu jenis permainan bernama taharrush era arab modern sekalipun hukuman pemerkosa sangat sulit diterapkan aturan arab yg mensyaratkan saksi jadi bila pemerkosaan dilakukan ruangan kosong misalnya mustahil dituntut adanya saksi begitupula sebuah pemerkosaan berkelompok mustahil pelakunya mau bersaksi melawan rekannya yg akhirnya menyebabkan tuntutan pemerkosaan tetap gagal jalur hukum aturan bangsa arab yg menguntungkan pemerkosa disebabkan budaya arab terkandung faham misogyny faham yg menganggap perempuan derajatnya lebih rendah pria wanita dianggap budak yg pantas dihukum faham misogyny seorang pria sangat sangat berhak memperkosa wanita faham misogyny budaya arab kuno yg dibawa imigran sangat mengagetkan bangsa eropa yg menganut faham emansipasi wanita budaya arab kuno perempuan wajib hukumnya menggunakan busana tertutup perempuan berbusana minim yg banyak berkeliaran eropa dianggap sangat sangat pantas dihukum cara diperkosa pemerkosaan perseorangan maupun berkelompok taharrush dianggap penghukuman wanitawanita yg mengenakan busana tertutup video terdapat cuplikan video taharrush yg terjadi eropa wanitawanita korban perkosaan ala taharrush kesaksian reporter wanita cantik yg sempat jadi korban taharrush penjelasan fakta taharrush bahasa frase arab baru populer perbuatan oknum pemerkosaan massal kalau negara bahasa inggris terjadi disebut gangrape indonesia disebut perkosaan massal jerman namanya gruppenvergewaltigung prancis namanya tournantes sejarah arab menyebutkan budaya perkosaan massal menjadi tradisi baik peradaban islam menyebar daerah tokoh isis syaikh al arifi datang masjid istiqlal sumber media sosial narasi rencana tablig akbar januari masjid istiqlal mengundang tokoh isis ditolak nkri jangan dijadikan sarang pengungsi isis lari suriah irak penjelasan rencana kedatangan dai syekh muhammad al arifi asal saudi tersebut indonesia ramai diperbincangkan media sosial bahkan imbauan melalui jejaring sosial masjid istiqlal menolak kedatangan al arifi alasannya diduga merupakan dai pendukung kelompok militan negara islam irak suriah isis kabar berembus media sosial al arifi menyampaikan tausiah masjid istiqlal januari imam besar masjid istiqlal jakarta kh ali mustafa yakub mengatakan masjid istiqlal menerima surat resmi permohonan izin ceramah dai asal arab saudi syekh muhammad al arifi memberikan izin penceramah dai luar ujar ali mustafa jakarta selasa ali mustafa masjid istiqlal pernah mengundang dai luar negeri berceramah masjid kebanggaan bangsa indonesia biasanya yayasan indonesia menampilkan seseorang lalu meminjam tempat masjid istiqlal artinya masjid istiqlal mengundang memberi izin sendiri mengaku bingung terkait tersebarnya kabar media sosial dai tersebut berceramah istiqlal padahal terkonfirmasi pengurus masjid dikonfirmasi mengenai direktur jenderal bimbingan masyarakat islam bimas islam kemenag machasin menyatakan menerima surat resmi pihak mengundang dai asal arab saudi setahu permintaan panitia biasanya kalau menyurati lalu periksa kalau memang catatan apa berikan izin ujar menjelaskan mendatangkan dai penceramah luar negeri biasanya panitia melapor terlebih kepolisian menyertakan surat rekomendasi ditjen bimas islam kemenag meski surat rekomendasi kemenag kata machasin pihak kepolisian memberikan izin terutama ditemukan catatan pihak imigrasi ataupun badan intelijen negara rekomendasi kemenag salah satu persyaratan memperoleh izin kata machasin memperoleh surat pihak pengundang jelas kemenag mengkaji kehadiran dai asal arab saudi menimbulkan masalah dinilai menimbulkan masalah kemenag memberikan izin sebaliknya dinilai berpotensi menimbulkan masalah diberikan izin pemberian izin menyangkut banyak termasuk kredibilitas kemenag kalau diberi izin menimbulkan masalah
